info.name: Glowy Super Gel Lightweight Dewy Multipurpose Illuminator
info.description: What it is: A water-based multipurpose illuminator that hydrates and brightens for a fresh, dewy look. Use it as glowy prep step, spot highlighter, or mix it with skincare or foundation. Can also be worn on arms and legs for a weightless, body shimmer!Finish: RadiantFormulation: LiquidHighlighted Ingredients: - Plant-Derived Glycerin: Powerful humectant known to increase skin’s natural moisture level.- Olive-Derived Squalane: Locks in moisture and leaves skin quenched and visibly glowing.- Rosehip Seed Oil: Ultra-rich in antioxidants to visibly brighten and moisturize skin.Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan and cruelty-free.What Else You Need to Know: This refreshing, lightweight formula is packed with Plant-Derived Glycerin and Squalane to deliver skin-quenching moisture. Fine micropearl particles give instant lit-from-within glow without chunky glitter or shimmer. Both shades of Glowy Super Gel are sheer and blend seamlessly into skin. Glowy Super Gel is fragrance free, safe for sensitive skin, and dermatologist tested. Clean & Planet AwareOur ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency.

product_variants.variant_description: What it is: A multi-purpose, water-based luminizer that hydrates and brightens face or body for a fresh dewy look.Highlighted Ingredients: - Plant-derived Glycerin: A powerful humectant that increases skin’s moisture level.- Vitamin C: Brightens and refines the appearance of skin.              - Rosehip Seed Oil: Ultra-rich in antioxidants that visibly brighten and moisturize skin.Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging.What Else You Need to Know: Made of 75 percent water and skincare-packed ingredients, Glowy Super Gel’s lit-from-within glow gives the ultimate no-makeup makeup look. Its universal shades can be used as a dewy primer under makeup, a spot highlighter, mixed with skincare, or as a body shimmer for an all-over glow. Choose Starglow for champagne-tinged dew or Sunglow for a warm golden bronze. Fall in love with the full size or pop the mini in your travel pouch.Clean & Planet AwareOur ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency.

review_distribution.statistics_type: I received this product as a free sample

reviews.review_text: Most products I’ve used like that have been very drying but it blends very well and keeps my skin hydrated!
Definitely a new stable on my skin care routine or even adding to tinted moisturizer! I used to use drunk elephant but this is much better for my skin!
reviews.review_title: Must have for skin care routine

reviews.review_text: This is my 3rd bottle of this product! I absolutely love this mixed with sunscreen under my makeup. Let it dry fully and it gives you the perfect glow underneath makeup year round! I use the darker of the two shades and am naturally very fair unless tanned in the summer. The product is light weight, doesn’t break me out, is truly my favorite Saie product!
reviews.review_title: 3rd bottle-perfect under makeup or just as is!

reviews.review_text: I'm absolutely in love with this face highlighter! It gives my skin the most gorgeous, natural-looking glow that lasts all day. The texture is silky smooth, and it blends effortlessly into my skin, leaving a radiant finish without looking glittery or overdone. Whether I'm going for a subtle daytime glow or a more dramatic look for evenings out, this highlighter delivers every time. It's become a staple in my makeup routine, and I can't recommend it enough!
reviews.review_title: A must have in my makeup rountine.

If I could give it 4.5, I would. I was PUMPED to first use this when I bought it, but when I did, I noticed a few things:
1. SUPERRRR GLOWYYY - made my skin so so so so soooooo glowy!!!
2. Did make my skin rlly red. - Without any produnct on, my skin is a little red. I've developed a pretty good skincare routine to get rid of it and this product almost completly reversed it. The redness does fade after awhile tho. I use concealer, bronzer and blush for my base with nothing on my forehead and once I was finished my base, the redness was completely gone. 
3. Doesn't tan skin too too well - one of the main reasons I bought this product was to "warm up" my face, but it didn't deliver too well. I put on as much product as I do for any other "tanning" solution and not much changed. I recomend using half a pump. (one pump id rlly big).
4. HUGE AMOUNT OF PRODUCT - I bought this about 3-4 months ago and I use half a pump everyday. If you showed my bottle to someone who doesn't know how long I've had this for, they would think it's new.

Overall, I love loev love this although rlly wish it didn't make my skin red. There's TONSSS of product in here. It'll last me YEARS!!!
99% recomend.

So for a few months now I have been looking for the perfect foundation that suit my dry and super sensitive skin. I've tried Haus Labs, it was okay but too thick for me and kind of patchy. Then purchased the Armani, I had high hopes for this because it felt so light and serum-like, but this foundation oxidizes badly on me plus, it does not stay long! So, again, I bought the Dior- this one a tad bit better than the first two, BUT it oxidizes a bit and at the end of the day, some parts of my face get patchy. Imagine my disappointment because, I have shelled out too much money. Then I decided to purchase THIS and it's really a game charger! When I say skin, I meant like that glass-skin airbrush Kardashian edited finish! What I do is I mix it with my foundation and skin tint and this has magically solved all of problems! For some reason it makes my foundation feels lighter on my skin! And it makes them last longer. No more oxidation and patchiness. reviews.review_text: This shocked me with how good it is! I ordered it on a whim without researching it at all and I am so glad I did! I like to use it mainly as a makeup primer all over my face. It is light weight and gives a beautiful glow with no shimmer! I also sometimes like to use it as a highlighter on my cheekbones for that dewy glass skin look. I have tried it on top of powder and everything, and even though it is a very liquidy formula, it never disturbs my makeup underneath! I just lightly dab it with my finger. Even though I do like a blinding powder highlight, I have been stepping away from that and looking for things that look more naturally radiant. This will still give you that pop and have your face catching the light without the look of powder sitting on top of your skin or chunky glitter.

I use this in my routine and it is AMAZING. I add it with my favorite moisturizer and then get left with a hydrating dewy shiny look! I use it not only on my face but also body which also works great!

This is not a clean product!! Clean at Sephora means that this product should be free of acrylates. This product has acrylates (hydroxethyl acrylate), which is an irritant to the skin when in high concentrations- this ingredient is very high on the list of ingredients for this product. I got contact dermatitis after using this. Adding "Clean at Sephora" when a product is not actually clean is pretty deceiving to say the least. Not suited for sensitive skin if you're anything like me and are sensitive to any irritants such as acrylates. Really loved Saie until this. :/

I have both the Sunglow and Starglow. The Sunglow definitely either evens out my tan or gives me a small amount of tan if I don't have one. The Sunglow will accentuate any redness on your skin, so be wary of that. The Sunglow is also a bit thicker than Starglow, which is really just a preference of texture to me. I love both products and usually use them after my moisturizer as a glow under my foundation or by itself if I don't end up wearing makeup. It's definitely more noticeable than Dew Drops from Glow Recipe.

This is a really beautiful, natural, glowy product. It's also a lot bigger than I had expected it to be, which made me happy due to the price. I have Starglow and it really just makes my skin look healthy. I have a weird patch of acne on my cheek right now (from before I started using this, don't worry.) and this doesn't accentuate the texture of it. It doesn't look greasy, either- just healthy. I really don't know how else to describe it. But at the same time, it's not going to be so much of a highlighter that you'll look like a human diamond or anything. You could probably build it up and focus the product on more precise spots on the face for a more blinding look. If you're on the fence, I'd say go for it. The one aspect of it that did catch me offguard was the scent. It doesn't smell like it's got harsh fragrances or anything but it does happen to smell like bread to me. Not a bad smell- just an unexpected one.

I first got this product in the sample size and tried it out for a few weeks. I would usually apply it by mixing a pump with my morning sunscreen application. After trying it out, I was hooked, so I bought the full size! I love a dewy, glowy look, and this gives just that. I've even gotten compliments on how radiant my complexion looks when I apply it. I was worried I would shine a little too much like the Teletubbies sun baby, but it's kinda hard to overdo it since the shimmer is pretty subtle when you mix it with moisturizer or SPF. It's also nice to dab a little on my cheekbones and nose for some extra glow. I have a super fair skin tone and this helps me look less like the ghost of a victorian child. I have acne prone skin and this has not yet caused me any issues. Over all, it's a super fun product that has made its way into my daily routine!
reviews.review_title: Just the right amount of glow!

This one is a glow from within that you can actually notice, it's not glittery like some of the other brands. My skin is mostly dry/combo, mostly on the dry side because I use Tret at night so skin prep in the morning is REALLY important regardless of what makeup or coverage I'm going for. I first apply my Vitamin C, then sunscreen, then I apply my HADA LABO Gokujyun Hyaluronic Acid Premium Lotion and then my Eucerin Complete Repair cream as moisturizer which is the only thing that has been enough to handle my Tret skin. After all of this, I apply the Glowy Super Gel all over my face (even if I'm not wearing foundation - when I do wear foundation I opt for light to medium skin tints on top of this). I'm already looking hydrated and dewy with all my skin prep but this product give me a glow to add on top of the glass/wet/dewy look my face already has at this point. I set my face with the Charlotte Tilbury setting, always, regardless of what coverage I went for that day. The spray does not take away the glow at all and it does make it last longer in my opinion.

this is genuinely a revolutionary product in my opinion. the facts that this makes ur skin glowy without emphasizes texture, is amazing. truly think this product is hyped for a reason. i do use this with another primer because i still like a sticky dewy primer

such a beautiful glow within product! a very light weight, primer, and also beautiful on its own! i’ve gotten the mini size in a few sets and will definitely buy the full size! i have the darker shade aswell anlove
I use this even as a combination/oily girl. I use this and then a lightweight foundation on top, and it helps to achieve that glow from within look. Absolutely obsessed!!

I find that many highlighter products are too shimmery / glittery. This one got it right - a subtle but noticeable dewy look. I just bought my third bottle (this time the big one!). I sometimes mix it with my foundation and other times I mix it with my liquid blush - it mixes well with both. I also use it by itself just under my eyebrows. The mini size container is plastic but the standard size one is glass (which I've already dropped and broken). The standard size one has the product in a thick plastic-like bag inside the glass container (thank goodness!); the mini size uses a disc to push the product upwards as the pump is pressed. Both packaging methods mean that you use every drop - no wasted highlighter! This product definitely has a permanent place on my makeup tray.
i absolutely LOVE this product! it gave me the perfect “bronzey” look. i was worried it would look to dark for my fair skin but it looked absolutely beautiful and blended nicely! 10/10 recommend!
This product absorbs so well without leaving any streaks! I used D.E and had to throw it out, so I’m glad I found this! It gives you a very nice clean, dewy glisten look. Highly recommended
This product it’s absolutely unbelievable. The glow under your foundation or skin tint makes it 10X better!
LOVEE!!! I use it as a base/primer for my makeup and lasts all day while keeping a healthy looking glow! Seriously such a good product.
Not the consistency I expected, almost watery but looks beautiful on skin for a natural but prominent highlight! Can also mix into foundation
Such a nice product. Gives a great glow and sort of acts like bronzing drops too, and I find that my makeup looks smoother when I use it. Def gonna be an everyday product for me!
This is great under foundation, mixed with foundation or as highlight! It looks like natural radiance and doesn’t magnify pores, if you have oily skin  and just want that “clean girl” or “dewy” look.
it’s very glowy and makes me semi tan but i don’t notice a whole bunch of difference. it didn’t break me out, and it’s such luxury feeling packaging.
I was excited for this product, but was pretty disappointed. It was pretty hard to blend and glittery. Will return, but if you like glitter you will like this.

Overall its a cool product but I wanted more bronze or tan after using. My skin isnt too dark so I guess I expected a little more. I compared a side with vs a side without and the only difference I saw was one was gliyyery and the other wasn’t. If you want that this product is for you!glitterglittery and the other wasn’t. If all
So good! I use it as bronzing drops and you don’t need any moisturizer! It is so glowy and gorgeous! You also get so much product! I recommend!

Wanted to like this but I do not understand the hype. It smells so horrible and it does not have any lasting effect on my skin. Thought it was only my bottle that smelt that bad but every tester has the same smell. Had to return.
Underwhelming. Good for those who want the MOST natural subtle glow. Floral scent.
Once i used this product i’ve never got more complements on that my skin looks so good.
I got it today and it was supposed to come in 4 days. It’s really good and glowy I have dry skin and I really recommend it !!

This highlighter is amazing if you're going for a more natural no makeup-makeup look. It makes you look glowing and like you just put all your serums onto the most perfect version of your skin. I frequently use this when I'm doing errands on my day off to look a little bit better. My tip is putting some on your bone right below your eyebrow to look extra awake. My major con with this product is that it really isn't made for full-coverage makeup looks. Makes sense for Saie though, can't really be too mad as a full-coverage glam isn't really their thing as a brand. It just dooooesn't sit well at all with powders or high-coverage foundations.

If you're wiling to accept this product for what it is, its amazing. However, I wouldn't buy it if you're looking for the most versatile highlighter that will suit all looks. Just know what you're getting into before you buy!
reviews.review_title: Be aware of what this product is really for

reviews.review_text: I tried the Starglow and Sunglow as a primer under my foundation, and I found that they both gave me a very glowy, dewy look to my makeup. I'm Indian, so I was worried about the Starglow being too light. Both shades blend out to clear, so I can honestly use either shade. But I think the Sunglow looks just a little bit better under my foundation. This can also be worn without foundation. I used it with just some concealer while working from home today, and when I was on a call with a coworker, she immediately told me that I looked great and that I looked like I was glowing. My only recommendation is to avoid putting it under your eyes. When I put concealer over it under my eyes, I got a grey cast.

Most pretty looking liquid highlighter ever, reminds me of the Becca shimmering skin perfector but 100x better. Looks so radiant and glowy, gives a fresh look on bare skin. Application is super smooth too and packaging is
I love this so much it is a must have in my routine it adds a nice tan look and is so good
My go-to primer!!! Makes my skin look so smooth and glowing.

I bought this thinking it was going to be like a highlighter version of the drunk elephant bronzing drops, I’ve tried the product on multiple occasions and I can’t see any difference besides plain glitter
This is such a great product. Everyone says it’s a dupe for the drunk elephant drops I think it’s better. it blends great.

This review is long overdue-but I absolutely love this product! I used to use the Becca backlight primer but as we all know, it was discontinued. :( This has been the closest product I could find to it. I know it's supposed to be used as a highlighter, but I use it all over as my primer and I love it! My makeup stays in place all day and I have a nice, subtle glow without looking oily. I even love to wear it alone if I'm out and running errands!
LOVE! I got this instead of the drunk elephant bronzing drops and it has such a pretty shimmer and glow. I use this under my makeup for a glowy base and even on top for extra glow.
I got this as a reward. It smells so awful that I had to wash it off immediately. It almost smells like a stink bug to me. Disgusting!!
after using it gave me a nice glow to my face and this product is not overly expensive over all this product is amazing.

This product is so fricking good. You can use it all over the face but I like to use it as a highlighter and it gives such a natural glow. I went to work after applying and when I caught myself in the mirror and saw the glow even after working for a couple of hours I was shook!!

For reference, I have oily and eczema prone skin. I used up 2 minis before finally buying the full size. I also tried the bronzy shade SUNglow and returned it because it was too patchy to blend. STARglow is perfection. This easy gel is gives long term hydration and is truly MULTIUSE!

PRIMER: I blend this everywhere except around my nose and under eyes, as I prefer a blurring soft matte primer. I use a pump and it helps my makeup blend, glow and prevent drying.

HIGHLIGHTER: I use this on bare skin or on foundation that hasn't been set and tap on the high points of my face.

IN FOUNDATION: I mix about a pea size into foundation or a skin tint to sheer out the coverage and give a bit of luminosity.

It's beautiful and when the gel dries down after hours of wear time, the shimmer that's left is a flattering pearl.

I love this so much it’s not too pigmented which is exactly what i wanted because i only wanted a slight bronze and a really nice glow. I loved the packaging of this however, the cap falls off way too easily so i’m afraid this could break if i’m not careful. Overall, this is a nice bronzing drops dupe and i will definitely be buying again easily which
The product looked good but the scent was weird and it broke me out. I would not recommend this for someone who breaks out easily but other than that it was good!
Leaves a little glow, but nothing special. Sadly Returning it. If you are wanting a glow under the foundation try glow recipe dew drops or elf halo glow

It had such a nice glow and it did what it claims to do, but it broke me out so badly. I have dry skin, and clear skin prior to using this. First product i’ve ever returned from Sephora, so disappointed.
This give you a very fresh look for an everyday make up. A healthy glow i have never seen in a product. REALLY LOVE IT

I love this product! I don't wear foundation, but I want something a little extra to my routine. This is the perfect glow and the product is light. I can't wait to 'shine' this summer with this product!
Love this for a lit from within glow. I use this on my skin, followed by bronzer and blush and it’s amazing!

Don’t really know how to feel about this item yet. I’ve used it a few times and it definitely does leave your skin sparkling but on my skin, while rubbing the product in my face, it sometimes peels :/
It works well and there’s a lot of product for the price… but WHYYY is there shimmer 😭 please reformulate without shimmer and it would be perfect !
reviews.review_title: Love for some bronze— hate the sparkle

reviews.review_text: doesn’t do much and it stung my skin. If I could give it a zero I would.

I love this product! This is the perfect dupe for the drunk elephant bronzing drops, and I think this product is better. It’s gives me a nice gooey bronze. I also am using it as a person with lighter skin, so I’m not sure what it would look like on the shade it’s “meant” for. I overall think this is a great product and it’s a staple in my routine
reviews.review_title: Better than the Drunk Elephant bronzing drops

reviews.review_text: After using this product i had such glowy skin and its such a great dupe for the drunk elephant bronzi drops, might even be better.
This product is so good and worth the price for the amount you get in the bottle. Such a good alts for the very expensive bronzing drops on the market this product will always continue to amaze me

I wanted a product that would be good for an all over dewy look. I use the bare minerals tinted moisturizer, which I love but it’s so light that it just kind of leaves me wanting a little more. I put this on today after my moisturizer but before my foundation, and i love it! All over dewy glow, but not over powering. I only gave it 4 stars because the sent is a little perfume-y which i don’t love, but it’s not a deal breaker. Get it!
It is so pretty and gives a shimmery bronzed look! Better than drunk elephant drops. I will be repurchasing this for sure!!
It works pretty good, exactly what it claims to be. The scent is really off-putting though, kind of an old lady floral perfume smell. And the L’Oréal g lotion is cheaper and works the same
I used once and NEVER again. The highlighter has glitter specks which I hate and it completely ruined my makeup when layered on top of a full face.

Perfect drunk elephant bronzi drops dupe. I really like the result. It leaves a beautiful glow. The only down side I can find is the scent (of flowers?). At least the perfume leaves after maybe one minute.
I love this product, it’s stunning in the skin. This product has never broken me out and leaves a beautiful finish and I find it lasts a long time in the skin.

the best glowy drops i’ve ever tried i heard they were a dupe for the drunk elephant ones so i tried them out and they are definitely better! they’re not as patchy as the drunk elephant ones and way cheaper!  i definitely think this is a dupe for the flawless filter since you can mix it with your foundation #sponsor me
Favourite primer but I use on days when I’m not wearing makeup. So good it makes me super glowy and not need foundation

After purchasing this Brand to review on my platforms … I quickly realized this was going to be a staple in my routine. I decided to review the duo kit with both shades. I wanted to see how “universal” It truly was. I’ll say on my light/medium skin tone I can easily wear both shades. There’s no true glitter or sparkle that disrupts or distracts from other makeup products over top. This product is more of a dewey glow that has the lit- from-within glow. I personally use it as a primer to add a subtle tackiness & sheen underneath my skin tints. Use in the high points of the face over top your foundation for a soft dewey highlight. Bridge of nose, cheek bones, temples and cupids bow are my favorite areas for an eye catching glow. Non irritating, not slippery, & not highly pigmented. Just a soft ray of light. Beginner friendly for sure! Highly recommend this Brand for skin lovers and soft glam beauty.

It’s was too watery. It’s should have a better consistency like the darker highlighter. It’s easier to mix with slip tint that way and also goes on better. I feel like this takes my makeup or sunscreen off bc of the consistency. Returning.

love this stuff. honestly better than the drunk elephant, and you get more for a better price. some complain about the amount of sparkle, but it is fine enough that it just looks like a nice glow. you won’t look like you smeared highlight all over your face! smells great too. not too overpowering of a scent, but not unpleasant or chemical-y either
loved it way more than i thought! upgraded from the mini to the regular size! i love how lightweight it literally is and doesn’t feel heavy whatsoever! the glow is amazing
If you want a dewy, non-glittery and sheer tinted highlight this is perfect. I dab it on my skin with a damp beauty blender and it looks so natural and glowy.
i actually love this! it gives a cute bronzed look and doesn't mess any other layers of makeup or skincare. i think it's worth your pocket ! although, i think it might make your skin a little oily
This is such a pretty product! I do really like it, but I feel like there are comparable options out there that might have a more obvious look. I would recommend it but it’s not SUPER noticeable!
I like the glow it gives to your skin, but the cons overweigh the pros this time. Smelled AWFUL! Felt very oily on my skin and was very liquidy when it shouldn’t be.

Immediately after applying this product my skin gave off the most luminous glow! It was very light weight and didn't make my skin feel oily at all. The packaging could definitely use some work but over all I am in love!
reviews.review_title: A must have in my everyday makeup routine!

reviews.review_text: I love this. I don’t wear foundation, just concealer, and this looks really pretty as a base before makeup. It enhances the look of your skin and give the perfect glow.
I’m obsessed with this! I use it every morning and it gives me such a sunkissed glow throughout the day. Will deff be repurchasing when I run out!!

I purchased this because I love glowy skin, and I hate wearing foundation. This paired with my sunscreen and a little bit of concealer has changed my life! It’s so beautiful on the skin, and it feels like nothing.

i was super excited to try this product because i has heard pretty good things about it. but i was sadly disappointed, all it does it leave sparkles on your face, and if you apply it with your hands, good luck getting it off them, because your gonna have sparkles on your hands all day.
reviews.review_title: Just puts sparkles on your face

reviews.review_text: Gives the most amazing glow! Such a beautiful tone. I wear it alone when I’m in a rush and it makes me look alive! This is a staple I can no longer live without!
reviews.review_title: Buy it, buy it, buy it!!

reviews.review_text: Very lightweight and pretty.  It's very sheer and gives a nice glow.

I got a mini of this in a holiday set, and I’ve been trying out for a few months. I do think there’s a customer for this, but honestly I haven’t been wowed. It’s very subtle and I just think that there are a lot of other products that illuminate better. I also don’t love the scent. I’ve been trying to put my finger on what it is exactly, and maybe this sounds weird, but it’s almost like a scented candle kind of fragrance, which I honestly don’t want on my face. I’ll use this product up over time, but won’t repurchase.

Recently bought this and I am just not seeing the hype. I was so excited for this as it seems to be everyone's go-to product. Dewy look does not last long and basically dissappears if you place anything on top of it. Save yourself the money and just get the Supergoop glowscreen.

It doesn't stink like some reviewers say, but it is NOT fragrance free. It has rose and papaya oil in it and it does smell like perfume. So it takes some getting used to especially if you're used to and expecting a fragrance free product. It feels light on the skin and is also moisturizing. Haven't tried mixing it yet with foundation or concealer.

So in my makeup routine, I have varied with this product. I now treat it a liquid highlight for a dewy natural yet beautiful finish. My only issue is that it takes off my blush underneath the product.
reviews.review_title: How i use it and how it looks and works on me

reviews.review_text: Been using this for a few weeks.. it’s very lightweight and works well with or without a full face. Adds the perfect amount of glow
It smells horrible. Like a chemical smell. I got a VIB sample, so maybe it was bad, but I was looking for a new highlighter since Algenist discontinued theirs. I'm sad I haven't found one yet.
So obsessed. Natural and glowy and gives me the best light tan. Will definitely be repurchasing

I love the glow this left - it's very sheer and pretty easy to rub in and is definitely a bronzing drops dupe. However, it looked a little orange on my face and turned it red. Otherwise, it's not that bad.
Love! It’s a perfect dupe for the Drunk Elephant Bronzi Drops and you don’t have to mix with moisturizer. I love the subtle tan and glow that it gives for my face.
I use this product every day I apply makeup I mix it into my foundation & it gives me a beautiful glowy base I don’t go a day without using it
This product gives me the perfect tan vibes!!! It is a drunk elephant bronzing drops dupe fs!!!!
I literally can’t shut up about this highlighter. I’ve already gotten like five friends hooked too. This product feels amazing on the skin, is so hydrating, and gives your face such a pretty glow.

This product is a STAPLE for my day-to-day makeup. It adds a beautiful "glow from within" look that's hydrating and doesn't make my skin appear oily. The consistency is a perfect hybrid of an oil, gel, and serum which I feel has made my dry skin appear much brighter after regular use. The gold shimmer isn't too subtle, so it can definitely be worn under foundation to add luminance to the skin. Price wise, I think $28 is quite reasonable for the amount of product you receive and the quality of the refillable glass bottle. I have repurchased this clean beauty product numerous times and will continue to do so! Definitely worth it.
It makes me look tan and radiant! Love this product
Better than Charlotte Tilbury but honesty just makes my skin feel dry. I prefer cerave tinted spf.. does the same thing.

Such a cute summer glow!!! Literally obsessed with this. I have combination skin and this doesn’t tug on to dry patches or cause me to look more oily. I would say this is better than drink elephant bronzi droops!

I love this brand so i got this to try and and it was amazing! it’s the perfect primer/ highlight or just beautiful on bare skin. you don’t need a lot of this product to get a glow and the gel formula is so nice and cooling on the skin.
Love this! The glow is subtle, but in the best way. And the scent is nostalgic for me...unsire why, but I love it! 5 stars.

shade “sunglow” is not for fair/light skin! I thought using a dark shade would work well for a bronzed glow like other similar products but it left an orange-vibe. the glow also didn’t last long. not sure if I will even bother trying the lighter shade, probably not.
It’s very pretty on the skin! However I never have issues with my makeup separating I always do a skincare routine and prep my skin for any makeup and noticed this separate my makeup.

I am OBSESSED! I got the darker shade to use as more of a bronzer and it blends so well. I wish I could bathe in this stuff. I don’t notice the smell other people have said. It’s such a great product!
I received this as a sample and I am completely in LOVE! I wear it all over my face for a gorgeous dewy look! I’ll definitely be purchasing this again!
Is it there? I have light to medium skin, and honestly could not tell a difference when I put this on. It’s super, super subtle. The packaging also takes up a lot of real estate. Returned.

I love mixing this highlighter into my foundation for a more glowy look. I have sensitive, dry, acne prone skin and haven’t experienced any reaction or irritation when mixing with products or wearing it alone.
reviews.review_title: Great, versatile addition to my makeup routine

reviews.review_text: amazing - so smooth and lightweight - adds pretty shimmer
It gives the most beautiful and natural glow to your skin love it
reviews.review_title: A must have for makeup or  no makeup days!!!

reviews.review_text: Such a pretty glow without the glitter most glowy products have. It’s just a nice radiant look, love it
This stuff is so pretty. You can use it for many things. I mainly use it as a highlighter and it looks so pretty, it makes me glow. I give it a 4 because it smells funny and kinda expensive.
Makes my make-up last forever and makes my skin so glowy and shiny. I definitely want to try the darker shade next as a dupe for the bronzing drops
LOVE. So lightweight, and such a great cheaper option to the drunk elephant d-bronzi drops. Holy grail! Also works for all skin tones and types.

This product is AMAZING! I got a little free sample with my last Sephora purchase and I was hesitant to try it because my skin reacts to everything. I have perioral dermatitis, acne, fungal acne, and my skin is super dry so I’m always careful with what I put on my face. When I tell you this is going to be a new holy grail!! My makeup looked like real skin on top of this and I stayed hydrated all night! It also didn’t break me out at all after I wore it for 9 hours! Seriously I’m love with this 1000% recommend buying it
LOVE this. Brings an instant glow to your skin! Worth the hype

I love, love, love this product! Its perfect for the dewy/jelly/glowy makeup look. I have a combination type skin, mostly oily with dry patches, but it doesn’t make me look oily at all. Just pure glow.
Je l’aime mais on doit faire attention de bien l’appliquer car il est facile de laisser une petite trace plus foncé. Je l’utilise avec ma creme de jour.

I use this product under my skin tint or even just as a base on its own if i don’t feel like wearing a full face. it is so beautiful and glowy but doesn’t make me look or feel oily, it’s natural, but so beautiful. i just repurchased because i love it so much. if you haven’t tried this you need to
ABSOLUTE NECESSITY for glowy looks it makes my skin look so juicy and gorgeous it’s become a staple for me both shades are stunning but mixed is just chefs kiss on my tan skin
I LOVE this!! Like, this just enhances my face alone or even with makeup! I have oily skin and this doesn’t break me out at all! And its a clean product! Go get this!
The absolute best! You won’t regret purchasing it, I have oily skin and this mix with the elf power grip….chefs KISS!! Makeup last all day and doesn’t break up on the face. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
Yesssss! I love this. It’s like a pearly glow and it’s hydrating like a moisturizer. Sun glow is also super good. Has a golden sheen I love them both
Don’t get me wrong this product makes you look super glowy and I wish I could love it but, the smell is terrible and it broke me out rly bad, I don’t recommend for sensitive skin. AT ALL!

I don’t really like liquid highlighter because it never sits on my face well. But this one…it is so light and pretty.. it gives the perfect highlight and glow. I didn’t think I was going to love it this much but I’m obsessed! 10/10 recommend
My favorite! Makes me look like I’m absolutely glowing! I mix a pump of this in with my moisturizer
Adds a nice and natural glowy base to makeup. I use this as a primer and it works so well.

i love this product, i have oily skin but it sits perfectly on my skin and doesn’t feel heavy at all. i am also very pale and this just gave my face such a beautiful color and glow. definitely recommend

This would be a 4.5 if it wasn't for the smell. I really thought I got an old product bc the smell isn't pleasant at all. However, love the consistency and love the effect it gives the skin. I've been applying this with some concealer and blush and it looks really good. I have oily skin so I was worried that it will make me look really shiny but it actually just gives a nice glow.

i’m iffy about this product. i got the shade sun glow and it did make me look bronze like it said. i noticed that it was kind of peeling off a little bit while i was rubbing it in. i tried without primer and moisturizer and it still happened.
the product was amazing it made my skin glow and i loved everything but one thing which was the smell it smelled so bad
Using this as my primer or after gives me such a beautiful glow with my makeup look done. I have sensitive skin and it didn't break me out either. No complaints!

This is a perfect highlight, before makeup glow, and all around product! It has the best glisten from all angles and will shine through your makeup in a radiant way rather than feeling like you are lathered in glitter! It looks amazing on the cheekbones or the inner corners! Could not recommend more!
Glides onto my skin so nicely I use it all over my face and it gives a nice glow.
Sheer, light and smells amazing. Goes on smooth over and below makeup/product. Non greasy.
I absolutely love this gentle glow this product gives me. It goes on smooth. It does not make my skin dry or oily. I have mature skin and it gives me a more youthful glow.
I have dry, acne prone skin and this product broke me out. Have a really pretty glow, but just didn’t work my acne prone skin.

I really love this highlighter! I’ve been on the lookout for a product that would give me more of a glass skin effect without the glitter and decided to try this out. The formula is a little watery and i wouldn’t put it on top of an already powdered face but overall, it’s great! No heavy scent and it lasts me all day.

Absolutely love this dewy highlighter! I use it under my foundation after primer and it helps give a flawless luminous finish. And It doesn’t break out my sensitive skin. Absolutely adore this product

Absolutely love this dewy highlighter! I use it under my foundation after primer and it helps give a flawless luminous finish. And It doesn’t break out my sensitive skin. Absolutely adore this product
reviews.review_title: A must-have for luminous flawless finish!

reviews.review_text: best glowy base product! makes my skin so naturally glowy! love it!!!
I love this product from Saie! It makes me look super glowy and sunkissed! I use it on its own or mix it with my Saie slip tint. Make sure you blend it good before it dries down though.
After trying countless highlighters, I’ve finally found the one for me! This highlighter gives off the most dewy, luminous glow. No speckles of glitter are visible and I am absolutely hooked.

It has a beautiful glow and bronze. Sometimes I use it as a bronzer, other times I mix it into a moisturizer to even out a fake tan. Beautiful bronze and better price than drunk elephant. All of these bronzing products do make me a little orange, but I think this would look stunning in the summer.
Switched to this after Flawless filter broke me out. I love it! No break outs, youthful glow, and no pores!!

This is gorgeous! It’s so natural giving you the most healthy looking glow!! I got the mini and I am sure this will last a long time since I don’t use it all over my face but rather like a highlight! Definitely try it out!’
Having trouble getting past the unbearable smell. I wanted to like it.
absolutely gorgeous!! has a nice, natural dewy finish while also adding some shimmer.

I love this stuff. I have super dry skin and wanted to find a way to look like I have glass skin but I don’t even start with any shine. This gives shine! It makes me look like I broke a sweat and it’s not sparkly at all! Everything I have been looking for! Thank goodness because I have been admiring everyone else’s oily skin, I guess we always want what we don’t have.
Really beautiful product but doesn’t provide a lot of glow, rubs off with foundation application, has a strong scent.
Absolutely obsessed. A little bit goes a long way & it has a gorgeous, natural dewy glow that lasts all day
I have super sensitive skin, and this doesn’t irritate my skin at all. I love to mix it in with my favorite foundation to sheer it out. It’s also a very natural highlight.

Bottom line, you need this if u want healthy, non dry looking skin. Put it on as a primer and your makeup will look 100/10. It has a very light scent of lilac which I actually enjoy and as a dry/sensitive skin girl it’s never made me break out
its alright definitely not an absolute need. i feel like its like the elf halo glow just without the coverage. wouldn't repurchase
Usually never leave reviews but I must with this everyone needs this such a glowy look
None
an easy to use product! I’ve had no problems with foundation laying over this, doesn’t change consistency of other products & you can def see a glow through your makeup!

Absolutely beautiful on the skin (glow from within look.)My skin LOVES the ingredients. It does have a pleasant smell to it but not overwhelming and no added fragrance. Awesome dewy primer/great for dryness
reviews.review_title: I WILL NEVER STOP REPURCHASING THIS ❤️

reviews.review_text:
I have the sunglow and love it so much. I use this on its own or with some concealer and have used it with a tinted moisturizer on top.. it always looks beautiful. 
My skin can be oily but this doesn't make me breakout or make me look oily, it's a softer glow. 
I didn't find that it has a strong scent at all, I had to try to smell it
I wanted to really like this but it cause my skin to breakout and become irritated.
Love this makes me look so dewy. also it does not have a weird smell for me personally.
This is really pretty to put under your foundation. I'm happy they made the Sunglow as it looks nice on my tan skin. It's not a product you can wear alone, but a really nice glow from within.
This is my favorite product ever! This adds amazing glow to your skin and is good for with and without makeup!
I’m obsessed with this product! i love mixing it with my moisturizer and applying it as a base. it gives me such a gorgeous glow! sometimes i even use it again as a highlighter!
Upped my makeup game sm, makes me have the prettiest glow ever

I love this highlighter! Gives such a pretty glow without shimmer, which I love. Wish it had better staying power as I find it’s gone after a couple of hours, but I still use it often and will be keeping it.
It smells almost like school glue and the scent is very strong. Its glowy, but I can’t get over the smell & I wouldn’t repurchase.

I couldn’t even properly test this product out because it literally smells HORRIBLE. I wanted a replacement for the drunk elephant bronzi drops and thought this would be good but it smells so bad I couldn’t even put it on my face
I love this product!! It doesn't have to be mixed with a moisturizer which makes the application so much easier. It's not streaky at all and has a perfect consistency!

I love this product. My pores clog rly easy so I’m picky with what i put on my face. This doesn’t make me break out, it makes me look so dewy which i always go for and my makeup blends SOO well with this. Once i forgot to use it and my makeup didn’t blend properly. A must have!!!
I don’t think I ever need another highlighter. This is truly it for me.
So lightweight but gives your face an amazing glow, without looking overly oily/greasy! This is so great on its own or under makeup! One of my favorite products that I own!
reviews.review_title: A must have for a dewy look

reviews.review_text: Such a versatile product! I love mixing it in with Saie Slip Tint or as a glowy and bronzy primer. The gel consistency is very blendable!! and its sooo pretty!
reviews.review_title: MUST HAVE FOR GLOWY AND BRONZY MAKEUP

reviews.review_text: I bought this product and loved it! it left my skin glowy and nice, and it lightweight, but it smells bad. i used it after i put on sunscreen and i didn’t put any makeup on, and it left a very glittery shine on my hand when i touched it. I don’t know if it was just because i put it over sunscreen and without makeup, but i was a little disappointed because it was a glittery mess. Overall i love it though because usually products make me break out but i loved this one!
This is the best product to put underneath my tinted moisturizer. It gives me a bronzed glow and looks like skin.

dupe for drunk elephant bronzing drops and gave a nice bronzed glow. however, this broke me out as it has pore clogging ingredients. recommend for non acne prone skin but don’t recommend for acne prone skin.
2 stars because it did give me a beautiful dewy skin look but oh my god I broke out SO bad. I have clear skin with stress acne’s but developed cystic acne places I’ve never broke out before. So sad.

I do love this product and the glow it gives off, however, I don't care much for the smell or the fact that I can't open it to see how much is left. it sits in this weird plastic inside the bottle so it's hard to gauge how much is left. I feel like it's already running low and I've not used it much.
I loved it until it started to break me out, it also smells horrible!! does give a bronze glow tho

Very glowy! It does look a little oily on me but that goes away and i still get compliments on it even when I think it looks greasy. It does dry down within an hour or two tho... maybe I am not applying enough but def keep that in mind! No scent and it looks natural on me even though I am of darker skin.
None
This product both broke me out SO badly and didn't add any noticeable glow.... You're better off without it.

This stuff is awful. I tested it on the back of my hand first and within minutes the area turned red and bumpy. I have no idea what ingredient caused it, but I’m sooo happy that I didn’t apply it to my face! It also smells HORRIBLE! 



It also smells soooo awful!!!

I have the mini size in Starglow. I haven't used it as strictly a highlighter, but instead over my whole face for a glow. I use two pumps for my whole face and the finish is very subtle. It kind of just makes my skin look healthy. I love it for that, however, the scent is so strong. I won't repurchase because I can't handle that. If it was unscented, I would love it but too mu fragrance gives me a headache and irritates my skin.

Such a pretty formula; it wears nicely and can be used to add a natural looking glow to the skin before concealer and/or foundation, or used as a regular highlight. Layers well with other makeup. I like the packaging (you get a lot of profuct and a little goes a long way) but sometimes a lot comes out even w a tiny pump.
reviews.review_title: Nice highlight; great for multiple uses.

reviews.review_text: The Saie Glowy Super Gel in shade Sunglow is the PERFECT dupe for the Drunk Elephant D- Bronzi Drops! I have both and I can confirm!! I use this with my moisturizer and it gives me a glowy and tanned look!

After trying various products to try to achieve a glow, I was often disappointed with the glitter that seemed to be left on my face. 
This is magical! Hello natural dewy skin!
reviews.review_title: How did I live without this magical product?!

reviews.review_text: I put this on after moisturizer and it gives a gorgeous glow. It doesn't stay throughout the day-- fades in 2ish hours, but leaves behind glitter that isn't too noticeable. It's not heavy and makes my skin feel hydrated, so I definitely recommend it regardless.
This is pretty and easy to apply. I use it as a highlighter very sparingly and it gives off that nice glow.
this gives such a beautiful glow, i just wish it was a bit warmer in colour. i mix it with a tinted moisturizer when i’m doing light makeup and it looks perfect!!

Nice product! Smooth on skin and leaves a natural glow! Love using for a natural look when I just want to use powder and have this as a base. If you’re not going to use this everyday i recommend purchasing the mini.
This highlighter cannot be worn under foundations like other liquid highlighters. There is also a strong and unpleasant scent that lingers for a bit.

i use this product with everything!! i mix it with my blushes, concealers, skin tints / foundations, and i even wear it alone for days i just need a simple on the go look. it gives me a youthful glow 24/7!!
I should’ve done more research before buying this. I expected a natural glowy look and it’s actually very glittery, but if I apply a small amount it looks nice.

Wowza! On good skin days, I will wear just this with no foundation for a gorgeous, dewy look that is unmatched by any other highlighter product. No streaks, all glow. Bonus that even the fairest of skins look amazing in this product!

The glow is really nice I blended it with my foundation, the warm golden bronze worked on my fair skin too..it wasn’t too dark or anything. Real pretty! Only minus is that it smells a little chemical-like. I wish I didn’t have to smell that.

Wowowow!!! This stuff is awesome! I originally tried it as a sample and quickly purchased the full size. I use this mixed with my skin tint and it gives me such a natural glow! It doesn't look glittery or shimmery, it makes my skin look moisturized and healthy.
reviews.review_title: The most beautiful glow I ever did see!

reviews.review_text: When I first bought this product I wasn’t fully sure about it. However, when I tried the saie  highlighter I fell absolutely in love with it. I highly recommended this product if you want a dewy natural look.

For me, this product didn’t really do anything for me. I usually do a glowy makeup look, and this just didn’t stand out with that: I thought it would’ve had more shimmer but it just sort of reflected light, 
which my base makeup already does. Not bad but not what I hoped for.
I bought this product because I wanted to add a glowy dew to my makeup routine. It exceeded my expectations and I will be repurchasing this product for a long time.

I swear to God this is perfection in a bottle. The glow this gives is natural yet not so natural that you can't tell that it's there. This product is my literal ride or die and I don't know what I would do without it.
Love this! The best highlighter out there. Gives a natural look. Will be repurchasing!
Super great glow. Nice natural shine that can be used as a primer. 100% recommend

I got this as an alternative to Charlotte tilbury flawless filter and I love it just as much, if not more than the CT. It’s lightweight, not overly shiny but leaves a beautiful natural glow under makeup. It does have a kind of baby 
powder smells to it so if you’re sensitive to smells you might avoid this.
This product makes your skin looks very naturally glossy. Doesn’t look glittery at all. Can use it with or without makeup. Love it for no makeup days!
i love this stuff! i mix it in with my jergens fake tan moisturizer and it leaves my face sparkling and tan
Leaves such a beautiful glow i love it! I personally mix it with my moisturizer and it applies so good

originally bought this because i couldn’t get my hands on the Drunk Elephant Bronzi Drops, but i ended up liked this product much more. i use it underneath my makeup to give that extra bronzed look and it works sooo well. got so many compliments and it looks so natural yet makes a big difference. definitely recommend!!!
I love the brand Saie! A majority of their products are exceptional and this dewy highlighter is no different. Similar to the Drunk Elephant Bronzing drops, the highlight is a great alternative.

love how lightweight it is! it feels a little messy to apply because of how thin it is, but otherwise that’s really it. love how natural it looks, not too aggressive. layerable as well, works well w powder and cream products. wears all day quite well.
I use it under my foundation and it adds a great glow. It doesn’t break me out either which is great for my sensitive skin
I love this product. It is super lightweight and blends easily into bare skin or makeup. A little goes a long way so dispense carefully!
This is by far the worst highlighter I have used. It doesn’t show up on my skin at all. Also it’s so hard to get the product out. Do not by this product.
Love this product for a low key dewey look. Works great alone or with makeup. Everyone who has tried my purchase buys it also. love.

This is more like a 3.5 out of 5.  I like that the finish is lightweight.  If you're looking for that "glazed donut" finish, this is for you.  On the other hand, it's almost too lightweight because it feels watery, and I have to apply too much product to get the desired effect.  My brushes were literally wet by the time I got done applying this to even just my eyes.  I knocked a full star off just for the foul smell.  I got this in a Sephora 2022 holiday set, and I thought I got an expired product until I saw other people here comment on the smell.  If I were Saie, I would reformulate this product to get rid of the smell -- there are too many highlighters out there that are as good (if not better) that don't create a negative experience during application.
reviews.review_title: PRO: Natural, Lightweight | CONS: Watery, Smell

reviews.review_text: I love this stuff. I personally mix it into my moisturizer and use it as a base. Sometimes I add highlighter to my routine and sometimes I don't. Either way it looks great and it wonderfully for a glowy simple look.
Pretty glow but smells terrible! When I blended the rest of my makeup over it, it made my brushes stink. I eventually got used to it but if you can't handle smells DEFINITELY don't buy.

Okay so I thought this would not be good for a dark skin girlie BUT OMG. It melts into the skin and just leaves a beautiful natural glow. I love how diverse the shades are no matter what skin tone you are! I got so many compliments on my skin and had people move back and forth looking at the glow. Not only that. It is not TOO shimmery. You can even use to for a more natural nose contour and to avoid the glittery look most highlighters have.

I don't wear (any) make up, ever, but bought this for days I might want a little glow during meetings. I honestly think it's operator error on my end, but I feel 50/50. If I had a brush and used it right, using it alongside other makeup, I'm sure I'd be WOWed. As someone who doesn't wear makeup, I'm probably better off with a glow stick.
There is a reason this is so popular on social media- it's incredible! I love the finish and how easily it goes on on top of my skin tint. Love!
Love. This has been a staple in my makeup routine since it was released. Gives a nice glow effect. I wear it under my foundation and or/skin tint.

It’s a solid enough product but I find there’s numerous items that do the job as well or better. This lifts my makeup if I use it alone as a highlighter. I prefer it as a primer. It definitely is a nice glow but the amount you need compared to other products (Supergoop Glow, CT’s Flawless Filter, etc.) tells me that unless I find another purpose I haven’t found yet, it won’t be a repurchase.

I first got this as a sample and as soon as I used it I needed to buy the full size because I knew I was going to finish it. It has a ver lightweight shimmer look and very manageable in your face it doesn’t feel caky with more make up on top of it. I love it!!

Love this product so much. Desert island pick! It's versatile (mix a pump into face cream and wear it all over for a glow and extra boost of hydration, layer it as a primer, and/or apply on top of makeup like any other highlighter). Goes on light and smooth, blends easily, and feels soothing on the skin. The glow is long-lasting, without big chunks of glitter, and skin feels extra hydrated. So many highlighters feel drying or tight on the skin but this doesn't. The most second skin-like effect of any highlighter I've tried! I appreciate that aspect most of all, especially as I get older. I'm on my third bottle. The glass bottle is recyclable btw, just remove the interior bag!
love it so much I use it daily makes my skin look amazing and pretty.
This product is amazing! I use it by itself or under makeup and it gives the most perfect glow and works as an amazing base for all day stay!

The best product! Can be used alone for a natural glow or with foundation for more coverage. I mix it with my CT beautiful skin foundation to get a lighter, glowier, everyday coverage. Lightweight and hydrating Lightweight and moisturizing.

Adds perfect glow without being too pigmented or glittery. My favorite highlighter except for the smell. Honestly thought I got an expired one but it smells just as bad in store. Awful unnatural chemical smell, luckily it seems to dissipate rather quickly, but I literally have to hold my breath when I apply it lol. After it runs out I'll try the Tower 28 or RMS Beauty highlighter instead.
Not what I expected. I wanted a liquid highlighter to add some dimension here and there and this is more of a foundation glow enhancer. Doesn’t do much.

The best dewy light highlighter around! My skin doesn’t feel like it’s suffocating like some other products do. There’s no glitter or sparkles, just beautiful radiant natural dew! Will repurchase and recommend to everyone!!!
reviews.review_title: Must have for clean face makeup

reviews.review_text: I use this product literally everyday and I use it as a primer, highlight, or even sometimes all over my face! I love the natural glow and it gets me so many compliments!!
Love this highlighter! it's my favorite. super dewy and natural. But the packaging is much too big! It's the largest thing in my makeup bag, it does not need to take up this much space!!!
reviews.review_title: Love this highlighter, but please reduce packaging

reviews.review_text: okay this is fire like i wasn’t expecting it to be this good. sits well under all types of makeup: no makeup days or full glam.
I got this in the holiday kit as a small size, and I swatched on my hand, and it smells horrible. Like an antibiotic or cleaner. It’s pretty sure, but the smell is powerful.

i LOVE this gel. i had a mini of the white shade and loved the glow effect i got and decided i was going to buy it in the bronze shade to give myself a tanner look coming out of summer. this looks so pretty when i wear it and makes me look gorgeously and perfectly tanned. said nailed this!!

I got this as a sample once and had to have the full size.  I mix it with my foundations and skin tints and it makes them look flawless.  My favorite combinations are this with Tower 28 SunnyDays or with Tarte Amazonian Clay foundations,
need a brush to blend if not your hands get super glittery but it’s great
I’ve loved every Saie product I’ve tried until this one- it feels like it does nothing, gives no color. A rare miss from this great brand.

A GORGEOUS liquid bronzer to make you skin look literally kissed by the sun. It blends in beautifully and sets down on its own, so no need to powder it down. I love that! The packaging is very lux too, so I'm a big fan!

My gosh, I love this product! I always get compliments when I wear this under my Saie Slip Tint or dewy foundation. It leaves your skin looking natural and radiant and gives you that hydrated glow everyone has been looking for. It feels refreshing on the skin and is gorgeous above or below the foundation. When people ask me if I could only pick one item from Sephora for the rest of my life, it would 100% be this. I cannot rave about it enough!
Not worth it to me. I prefer elf halo glow or CT flawless filter.
Very lightweight like the product says, not to glowly, just the right amount of shine and highlight. Melts onto the skin :)
My face felt really greasy when I put this on over my moisturizer.  Also, it made my face look washed out compared to my neck and chest, not glowy.

This highlighter is so light and provides the perfect dewy look. It goes on smooth, lays well under makeup or can be used alone- overall, love! I can use both starglow and sunglow with ease, with star glow having a cooler tone/silver and sunglow being a bit warmer/gold (pics in natural light shared). I rated 4 out of 5 stars because of the smell. The smell is nice but it is strong in my opinion. By the end of the day I can still smell it on my face which isn't my favorite. I will continue wearing because it is THAT good but future versions would be improved with a more subtle scent.

Have used this product for a year or more.Love using this Starglow shade on my aging skin to provide a perfect subtle,moisturized looking glow! Add it to my slip tint for smooth coverage and then often add a few more gentle taps of it on my final face. Great on your neckline for a pretty evening glow. The bronze tone GSG is a great addition to add a glimmer to my summer tan. Just received  the newest Warm glow shade which I will now add to my collection.Can’t think of anything I don’t love about this product!
reviews.review_title: Love this product in all shades!

reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this and almost tossed it because I hate highlighters, never liked the look. My skin is super oily. I decided for the heck of it to apply a little to my cheek bones. I’m  blown away. Most natural looking illumination I’ve ever seen. Absolutely perfect to give a little dimension to an ultra flat matte foundation. Heck yes.

I left a review for the champagne color, but I loooooove the bronze color as well, I tried both of them out and the bronze on is perfect under foundation, it gives a sunkissed glow like i’ve been at the beach all day! I let my sister try it and she has a deeper skin tone than I do and looks like she is glowing naturally like from within! She asked me to buy her a back up of it immediately!

I used this product a few times already and have tested it using it differently each time, and every single time I got compliments from all the girls I live with! I use it on no make up make up days with just concealer, under foundation or just as a cheek highlighter, even with my moisturizer and everyone just keeps saying I look like I am glowing from inside. This is something I will be repurchasing forever.
reviews.review_title: Get this if you want compliments on your skin!

reviews.review_text: I love using this product alone or on top of my makeup for a perfect dewey glow. It adds so much shine to wherever I use it on my face. And a little goes a long way!
I have both colours of this (one for the summer and one for the rest of the year when i'm more pale). I am OBSESSED with this. The best highlighter on the market. A true game changer.

Recently I was given a change to try out Saie’s Glowy Super Gel Lightweight Dewy Highlighter in both shades, Starglow and Sunglow. I really like the packaging, a pump bottle that allows you to adjust the amount of product you press out from the container. A little going a long way, I appreciate having a lot of control with how much highlighter I can expel as to not waste product.

I enjoy the sheer luminous finish this product offers without it feeling heavy of sticky on my skin and dries down nicely without sliding all over my face, allowing me to be selective in my placement. Both shades are quite wearable, Starglow is a champagne shade that I think would look good on most skin tones were as Sunglow is a slightly darker and warmer bronze shade. Both of these shades contain microfine glitter particles, yet I think I see more glitter in the Sunglow shade. In general I am not a huge glitter fan but these pieces are very fine and do not feel chunky or scratchy on my sensitive skin and although noticeable on a swatch test, the actual glitter particles are harder to see on my face allowing for the highlighter to look natural after a light application to something much more glamorous with a heavier hand. 

It is worth noting that I consider myself scent sensitive and although this product is not without a fragrance, it reminds me of lilac much like the Kosas products do. The scent does linger as I can still smell it on the back of my hand where I applied even after washing, but it is not over powering and not a deal breaker as I don't smell it on my face once applied.

I admire the versatility of this highlighter and I want to continue exploring how this will work as a primer as well as mixed into my other cream products. I have used it over cream eyeshadow without creasing and I am happy to say that this highlighter does not make my texture or pores more pronounced, nor does it irritate my dry sensitive skin making this a product I will continue to reach for.
If it wasn't for the scent I would totally give it a 5 stars. It is just too strong for me, personally. Others may not mind it at all! But it is a good product overall.
reviews.review_title: Loved the product, not the scent.

reviews.review_text: This highlighter is absolutely mesmerizing! It gives a beautiful subtle dewy highlight. It reminds me a lot of Huda Beauty’s dewy shade in her Rose Gold palette. It’s light to wear, isn’t overly blinding and adds a healthy glow. I cannot say enough good things about this product.
This stuff is amazing- leaves your skin looking beautiful. I put it on after my full skincare routine and before I add any tinted moisturizer or foundation. Looks great barefaced too.

If this has one fan, it’s me. If this has no fans, I’m dead. This is glass skin in a bottle. Goes over powder. Under powder. By itself. This will give the most beautiful glow and lit from within. Will buy this forever.
I wish I would have bought the full size. I hate glittery highlighters so when I found this I was shook! Buy this y’all !!

I love this product! I use it every day before my sunscreen to add that dewy finish to my skin and make it glowy all day. It does not irritate my skin. It looks pretty natural on the face. Great for under foundation 😍
AMAZING! super glowy and natural and so thankful to the sephora employee that put me on to this before the hype! gives an ethereal glow even after powder!

I use this as a primer under my foundation. It brightens and evens out my skin and takes years off my face. Makes my foundation look more natural. I originally got this as part of a Sephora Favorites clean makeup set. Miracle product. Will be re-ordering.
reviews.review_title: I use it as a primer

reviews.review_text: The product is very nice and looks pretty, but it does not live up to the hype. It mixes well and layers well with foundation and other products. I am not wowed by this product, it is just okay.
Not the worst product I’ve ever used; however, it was very fragrant and gave me itchy skin and pimples.
Best smelling product ever, makes my dry skin feel so smooth and hydrated. I got the darker shade because it makes my skin a perfect dewy tan when I apply it. Buying again.

The pros: no tacky chonks of glitter, can be worn under foundation and on top as a highlighter. Works really well as a glowy primer and has a beautiful complexion-evening quality. The only con: it's got a strange scent, almost like the air inside an indoor swimming pool at a community centre.  But I'd rather that than added fragrance!
I love this product so much. Price is amazing and you get so much product! A little goes a long way.

This product is beautiful, I won't lie. BUT, it broke me out so bad to the point I had 7 pimples on the go. My skin is always clear and this was the only change in my routine so sadly, I knew it was this. It also smells so disgusting it's hard to ignore.
reviews.review_title: Smells HORRIBLE and Broke me Out

reviews.review_text: I like it! Doesn’t work well over make up in my opinion but as a primer or mixed with moisturizer or blush it’s great! Very lightweight and comfy to wear.

I want to love this because the glow is fine and gorgeous. Unfortunately every time I use this as an all over bronzing highlight or mixed with foundation, I get 2 pimples the following day.

Too late for me to return so I’ll probably mix with body lotion and use it as a body product instead of my face. :(

I am 68 and this product is awesome. It’s like a moisturizer and a bronzer all in one. It goes on easily and gives a beautiful subdued color. Great for a quick on the go face makeup. Also, the price is so reasonable. 5 Stars!

Love this product! Sheer, but definitely works well when I mix with my foundation to make my makeup more glowing & tan! Totally recommend if you are looking for something to use on its own as natural or to mix for more coverage!
Leaves a nice natural high light.  If you liked the one from Becca, this one is even better for pale skin tones.

I had originally bought this because I couldn't bring myself to drop the money on a full size Flawless Filter, and wanted to compare it to that to see if I liked the effect this gave. I have to say, I like this more than I have ever liked Flawless Filter. This has the lightest feeling on the skin, almost like a serum, and just gives the prettiest glow. I have started using it multiple ways depending on what I am going for - under foundation to give my skin a glowy undertone, mixed into foundation to sheer it out and add a luminosity to it, as a light highlight, over concealer to even out my skin on light makeup days - all of it looks so good. This layers so well under foundation because it is so thin, so it never feels like I am caking on heavy layer after heavy later, and it doesn't disrupt any products I apply it over. This is honestly such a beautiful product, and you can not beat the price in comparison to other products like this on the market right now.

The extra step your beauty routine needs. This makes my skin look glowing. I prefer to apply the product before any face products, but I’m sure you can apply after has a highlight. My only downside is that if you are applying this product with your fingers, they will be glittery afterwards.

The best dewy highlighter I have ever used. It is flawless and lightweight and it is not sticky. It leaves my skin illuminating all day. I mix a pump or two with my normal foundation. I HIGHLY recommend this product!

I like it. It’s nice, it’s glowy and dewy. But I don’t think I would repurchase. I find it works best mixed in with moisturizer or my primer. But it’s not something I NEED. I feel like I get the same effect from other products. But I don’t like layering under foundation. Makes it a slippery mess.

Packaging is great, product is great! Everything from this brand has been wonderful. I like adding a small amount on top of my foundation to give a very subtle, very natural looking highlight. A little goes a LONG way!!

I bought it after seeing it on TikTok and thought hey I need a glowy highlighter. Nope this is not the product is watery and barely noticeable on the skin. For that reason this is not worth the price and the ingredients are not ground breaking. Just because a product says clean does not justify  the cost.
reviews.review_title: should only be half the price

reviews.review_text: This is an amazing product! So easy to use and can be used in so many ways! I love mixing it in with my foundation for an all over glow.

This broke me out when I tried to use it on bare skin. It sheers out to nothing when applied to the highpoints of the face over foundation with a brush or beauty blender; very patchy when applied with fingers.

I do like this product and I will continue to use it as it runs out. I would apply it to certain spots after doing foundation, concealer, and setting powder but you couldn't see it much. I tried applying it under my foundation but left my face to greasy. However when applied after foundation it leaves a really nice dewy and subtle glow.

Glowy! I am loving this product! I can use it as a primer under makeup, mixed with a blush for a wash of color with a hint of glow or highlight the high points of the face! In the pic I’m sharing I mixed 1 pump of my SAIE glow gel with a small dab of the Danessa Myricks cream pigment in latte for a mauve glow on the cheeks! I’m literally obsessed with mixing this in with my blush or as a primer prior to my foundation. This makes my 37 year old tired mom skin look so pretty and glowy and I feel beautiful.

This is my absolute ride-or-die holy grail product. It gives the most beautiful glow, and even when I'm pretty tan in the summer, there isn't any white cast. It makes me feel so glowy and pretty, and it lasts all day long without making my face feel sticky. My favorite thing about this product is that it's extremely lightweight and can be used all over the face or on your high points!

This is really pretty dabbed on cheekbones as a last makeup step. The only issue is it evaporates pretty quick so you have to reapply pretty often. I like it! But it’s just definitely not a long wearing product.

Meh. I wanted to love this product. It didn’t do anything special and if I put make over it, it was not noticeable. I’d skip this. There are better products to out there to give you want you want from this.
I got a sample from the bazaar and OMG I had to immediately buy the full size one. It makes my skin look so dewy. I even put a pump with a bit of foundation.

Glass skin, check. Dewy goddess, check. Beautiful on its own, under makeup. If you are looking for something to give you a beautiful highlight the heavens can see. This is it. If you put it on after your foundation, it doesnt move it around. Literally so beautiful to highlight your décolleté. Cant say enough good things!!

The perfect “glowy, no make up” make up base. It was given to me as a free sample and I fell in love with it instantly. As a slightly oily skinned girl I was a little nervous about trying a glowy illuminizer but it’s the perfect kind of glow. And lasts all day!! My only note is that my tinted moisturizer doesn’t apply well overtop when I wear this all over my face. It makes the tinted cream roll off my face. However, if I apply a little bit of this on the areas I want highlighted then I have no problem at all. It looks great all on its own though too. Also, smells great.
It's pretty on but I couldn't get past the rancid smell! :(

it’s nothing special tbh. it’s a cute liquid highlight when u use it on areas u would put highlighter but it’s not giving anything when u put it all over ur face before makeup. looks super pretty tho!!

I just finished my bottle and I think it’s time to share my opinion about this product.it’s super lightweight gel texture and you don’t feel any heaviness on your skin. Me personally was using it by itself and wouldn’t apply any foundation and it was giving such a natural healthy glow to my skin.
Nothing special. Color seems to fade the more you blend in- looks like a CT flawless filter blended out. Overall not a bad product.
i definitely recommend this over the charlotte tilbury one tbh it’s definitely more light weight and doesn’t enhance my pores
Cute natural glass skin like finish.  Smell is disgusting tho. Smells like nasal spray

Such a beautiful thin formula. This is NOT a blinding highlight. It gives a dewy appearance to the skin without being overbearing. There’s no scent & the product does seem to blend well all over the face, along with on top of cream makeup. This product does break apart powdered makeup.
This stuff works great as a primer or worn alone over my skincare.
It didn’t do much for my medium toned skin. I much prefer Charlotte Tilbury flawless filter.

This stuff makes your skin look FLAWLESS. I actually adore it. But it makes your makeup starts to separate after a few hours, even with a really good primer like hydro grip. I’ve tried it with multiple liquid foundations and concealers, and same thing happens every time. It’s such a shame because it’s so pretty. Perhaps with a powder foundation it wouldn’t have this issue.

I am NOT a glittery kind of girl - at least for highlight. So when I found this product I knew this would likely be up my alley. I blind bought it and let me just say - I am so glad I did. It’s a regular part of my routine now and I will definitely be repurchasing.

The best of the best!!! I do not leave the house without this multitasking gel, it provides the most beautiful glow that does not look greasy or artificial. The most naturally beautiful glow you could ever dream of... Use it on bare skin for a no-make up glow, or mix it with your foundation for an enhanced makeup look. I have influenced every friend of mine to buy this gel after letting them try mine
This has lots of product and is worthy he price. You only need a tiny tiny drop to get a nice glow.
It’s a  lovely product. Goes on really nice! super lightweight If you want a VERY subtle glow!! I’d definitely invest in this. I put it on after my morning skin care for a perfect finishing touch :)

This product is great mixed with foundation or as a highlight after! You need so little of it to make a difference, and it looks so smooth and not too glittery. In this pic I mixed it in with a matte finish MAC foundation for a glowy dewy finish
Super good product , good calidad,gran price , I love product

I bought this just from reading the description and I was intrigued. This has become a holy grail INSTANTLY. After I prep my skin and put on spf, i take a pump and put this on all over my cheeks and forehead for a beautiful glow. Sometimes I even put it all over my face. I can totally see this and the bronze shade being dupes for the VB priming moisturizer. Will definitely get the other shade so I can mix and play!
I Wish It had SPF 50 and skin care benefits like Hyaluronic Acid and Glycerin so you could use as No makeup Glowy look, with sun protection and skin care benefits!
reviews.review_title: It Could have SPF and Skincare Benefits

reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful product, I've been using it for almost a year. I have dry and dull skin, but this product gives me a candlelit glow from within. It's a very natural, healthy glow, and is totally not heavy or sticky on the skin. I use this underneath my tinted moisturizer (I use the Nars one!), and it's the perfect combo for my skin type. I live in a very dry and cold climate, and I used this during -25°C weather in December, and this makeup combo did not cling to any dry patches, which most products do. Definitely a holy grail product in my makeup collection.

I tried both variations in the store, and I noticed that sunglow really complemented my warm, tan complexion. It’s not glittery at all and looks great under direct sunlight. I did notice that after consistent use it was breaking me out a little (probably from some of the skincare-focused ingredients), but I have sensitive skin so that’s just a personal issue.

I use this highlighter mixed in with my sunscreen as the last step of my skincare routine if I’m having a “no makeup day”. I am indian with a pretty medium skin tone with golden undertones and I do not think that it does anything SPECTACULAR for my skin - it adds a little tint but not a ton of glow.
