I haven’t worn a full face of makeup in a while so I am going to attempt to mix it with foundation. But it does add a fun simple final step to your skincare and gives the slightest of glow.

This is amazing after moisturizing and going for a natural glow! It gives a healthily luminescence and doesn’t feel greasy if like it is suffocating my skin even after doing my glass skincare routine.

“I received a gift card to select a product of my choice to review“  and this glowy dewy highlighter is phenomenal! It truly is lightweight and has a beautiful glow. I wear this by itself and boy let me tell you I am in love and frequently wear it without foundation. It also matches my complexion beautifully! This is a must have! There is no stickiness or greasy feeling and it wears well all Day!

[I received a gift card to select a product of my choice to review] As a mom of two I typically skip the makeup routine. But ever since I purchased this highlighter it’s been my go-to! I wear a tinted SPF daily and have loved applying this overtop. The warm golden bronze color is going to be perfect for summer! Couldn’t recommend this product enough!

Love this!  I’m not very comfortable with liquid highlighters yet but this one is very easy to apply. I put it on the back of my hand and rub it then apply with a beauty blender. Glass skin!  Soft luminous and perfect for day use too

I received a gift card to select a product of my choice to review. This was my first time trying anything from the brand and I was super excited to try this highlighter/primer out. I was very pleased with this product. It gave the right amount of glow, without me getting too dewy. It gave me that glow from within type of look. This is perfect during the summer time as I tend to wear my skin tints than foundations. I definitely recommend you try this for the perfect amount of glow on its own or under makeup.

I received a gift card to select a product of my choice to review. 

Great for those who love a dewy look. I thought it’s just a simple highlighter but no… you can also use it as a primer or a foundation. I’m truly impressed!

(I received a gift card to select a product of my choice to review.  All opinions my own.)

I opted to try this because I love a dewy, glowy makeup look.  Short take is: it's quite pretty, though it gives a subtler look that could probably be achieved with other products too.  

The packaging is nice, I like the glass bottle, pump, and that it's big enough to use on the body too (which I think would look beautiful).  It has a thin, lightweight texture that feels wet and thin on the skin, but it has enough body to not be super watery.  I apply it all over the face on bare skin (see photo) and then apply makeup on top - It has layered well with all the makeup I've tried so far

It feels almost like light skincare when applied, absorbing into the skin to leave a light wash of pearly shine that makes the skin look luminous.  The particles are small enough that you don't look doused in glitter/shimmer, which I appreciate.  However, it can be quite subtle if not in direct light, so I wouldn't use it as a highlighter over makeup (too wet, not noticeable enough).  I like the way it feels and could see pinpointing it on your high points to use as a very subtle "highlight" if you're not wearing makeup that day - since it's so light, it doesn't have a makeupy look on the skin and wouldn't stand out texturally on bare skin.

Overall, I think it's a very pretty product, but definitely niche - best for people who want a slight glow and prefer lighter makeup!  Also, I've tried both shades and Sunglow, though deeper looking, is sheer enough to work on almost all skin tones.  Both are veeery lightly pigmented (basically an unnoticeable base carrying small luminous particles)

This was a total impulsive buy. BUT LET ME TELL YOU. I have never loved something so much. THE HIGHLIGHT is everything it says LIGHTWEIGHT, GLOWY AF, AND STUNNING on. My first time wearing this I got so many compliments!

I received a gift card to select a product of my choice to review. If I could give this 10 stars, I would! If you want the dewy look, but have dry skin, or just want a beautiful highlighter that gives you the glow from within status...this is the product. It's comparable to another well-known primer type highlighter, but with clean ingredients and this one applies and feels even better. I can't say enough good things about it, if you're on the fence, buy it and thank me later!
i was so excited to try this, but the smell is so odd and it leaves glitter on your hands :( definitely not worth the money

I received a gift card to select a product of my choice to review. I put this on for the first time and wore it by itself (with blush and mascara) because of how beautiful of a finish it had - this is perfect for a no make up make up look. The saie glowy super gel in “sun glow” gives the perfect inner glow that radiates even under foundation. It feels really hydrating and would probably pair well with any bb cream or skin tint in your collection. Perfect for the days where you wanna look like you did a lot without actually doing a lot!
reviews.review_title: Honestly, you could wear this by itself.

reviews.review_text: I received a gift card to select a product of my choice to review. This is such a perfect “your skin, but better” type of product. I use this as an all over primer for a dewy glow under makeup, but I really love this on its own! It gives you such a perfect “your skin, but better” type of glow that I’ve been loving! I do use a mattifying primer on my T-zone because I’m combo-oily, but that’s normal for me. I’ll even add some extra of this to my cheekbones as a subtle liquid highlighter. This is such an amazing product for summer!
Legit so pretty and natural. A subtle shimmer and internal glow look. A dupe for the CT flawless filter I think. Buy it!!

This product is really nice. I especially like the frosted glass container and pump. You can pump the tiniest amount. It is very subtle though. I am older and every little bit helps. This product does exactly what hourglass powders do even though one is powder and one is liquid. It’s specifically similar to dim and diffused light. It just give that slightly younger luminescent skin. Not too glowy which is a good thing for me. I wouldn’t even count this as a highlighter. It feels nice and is not tacky. The pro to this product over hourglass is it has some skin care ingredients. Hourglass powders last forever so I will have to see how long this lasts to decide if I would repurchase. I deducted a star because it’s not a “game changer/holy grail” product for me personally. I’ve been using it a month now and I like it.
I use it as a primer. It gives a beautiful glow to the skin without looking greasy

I bought the lighter shade of this in a mini size and wanted to buy this shade in a mini size as well so I could compare the 2 shades on my skin. Unfortunately I could not find this shade in mini size so I bought the regular size and it is too dark for my skin tone. I know it’s a good product because the later shade works perfectly and I’ve actually just been using that with some clear gel on my eyebrows and a few mascara swipes on my lashes and that has been my summer look during the hot days. With this shade being too dark it’s a bit of a waste of money but I will ask one of my 3 sisters if they want to try.
reviews.review_title: Too dark of a shade for my fair skin

reviews.review_text:
I received a gift card to select a product of my choice to review. 

This product has a lovely subtle glow—the perfect summer sun-kissed look. It’s easy to wear alone, above foundation or to highlight your cheeks and nose bridge.

Gives a sun kisses glow for sure. But it smells terrible…the scent is so off putting that I don’t want to use it at all. But after spending so much on it, I can’t waste it. Just hold your breath and don’t take a whiff until it dries.

I love this product!! It is perfect for summertime because it provides a very natural glow under or without makeup. I wear it with the too faced both this way foundation and I love the glow it gives without me looking oily.
it’s pretty i just don’t like the smell! smells like dead roses

it gives my skin the prettiest subtle glow! love under skin tint, on its own, or used on top of skin tint as a subtle highlight. makes my skin look healthy and fresh. perfect on hot days when you don't want to wear any skin tint or foundation but still want a little something to look brighter and awake!

Super beautiful natural highlight !! It’s perfect for a summer glow or no makeup makeup look. It has a slight scent of like orchids or some flower. It’s super beautiful! It is more of a glow yet it has small small sparkles to it. It’s pretty natural looking so if you’re a person who likes sparkle-y highlighters I’d look for something else. But I love this!! You definitely don’t need a lot of product to achieve a bright glow
Beautiful under or over makeup and even just on its own! Cant recommend enough! After I finish my mini I’ll definitely buy the big one!
I love this product. Gives a beautiful natural glowy look. I use it under my makeup and it looks great.

I love this product! It makes my skin have a subtle glow without any makeup on, so you could wear it alone. With makeup my skin also look very dewy and glowy! 100% recommend! Also great for a glam look to give extra glow :)
reviews.review_title: Love this for a natural, dewy look!

reviews.review_text: Leaves such a natural glow & sheen to the skin (vs. the more intense glittery look of powder highlights). I love mixing it into my foundation for the glowy/glassy skin look and dabbing it on top of my cheeks, nose, inner corners, and chin.
reviews.review_title: Perfect for that glowy, natural clean girl look

reviews.review_text: Wasn’t a very bright highlighter definitely left a pretty finish but not what I wanted. It’s still gorgeous if you want a soft glow
i love this product! its more of a  sheer illuminator than highliter it looks great under a skin tint.

I received a gift card to select a product of my choice to review. It's my first time trying a dewy highlighter and I love it so far. I applied it before using concealer, so it sort of became faint, and I had to reapply after setting my make up. If you like a minimal dewy look, you'll love it. It's very light on the skin. I'll be wearing it a lot this summer.

I really wanted to like this because the glow it gives you is absolutely gorgeous but sadly when I tried this product I had a really bad break out on my face like I had a bunch of bumps all over my cheek where I placed it and this was the only new item that I used in my skincare/make up routine but like the glow was really nice but I prefer the charlotte tilbury one because it doesn’t break me out anyways for reference I have dry skin
Amazing product! My skin looks fresh and dewy. Don’t need to wear any foundation since using this.
Perfect dewy highlighter without being greasy. Looks great underneath makeup as a glowy base.

I like the product (under foundation or just by itself), but I found the packaging to be dangerous —if you keep it in a drawer or anywhere you might pick it up by the lid one day, the lid doesn't have enough of a hold on the bottle. Mine shattered and now there's a lot of product left but I have a plastic pump with shards of broken glass still attached to it.

*I received a gift card to select a product of my choice to review*
You guys, I heard a lot about this dewy highlighter on TikTok & this did not disappoint! I got so many compliments on my skin while wearing Saie's Glowy Super Gel. It gives a light bronzed tint & it feels fresh on my skin! Will absolutely be wearing this all summer long.
reviews.review_title: My go-to highlighter for the summer!

reviews.review_text: This is an INCREDIBLE product!! I can't wait to put this on every morning. I use it as a base before foundation or alone on a "no  make-up" day (something I'm willing to do now because of this product!) and the healthy, dewy glow it gives my skin is just amazing. It has such a lovely, moisturizing feel and that glow...I'm obsessed!! The fact that I'll now wear just this product alone after moisturizer and sunscreen, when I've always been someone who never leaves the house without foundation, says it all!

Highly recommend! I typically go in with this product after I’ve primed and prepped my skin. Goes beautifully under foundations or skin tint. My skin has never looked better; this product makes my skin look soft and glowing.

I really enjoyed this! I liked to mix it with my drunk elephant bronzing drops before starting my skin make up. Really enjoy the glow from within really hydrated look it gives the skin. Super comfortable and lightweight on the skin especially since I use it as an all over first layer. I bought the darker shade so I’ll be trying that on its own next
love this!!! mixed with my foundation and my skin glows, glows, glows..

I found this to be a great alternative to the CT HFF in the lightest shade that turned out to be too dark and orange. I’m really pale so the translucency of this product worked the best for me. It does have a gel feel but felt so much more hydrating than other “gel” primers. Combined with their setting powder, I’m in love!! I have dry skin and have never found two products that have worked this well for me before.
reviews.review_title: Perf glowy primer for dry, dull skin

reviews.review_text:
I’m in love. I love dewy skin. I don’t wear foundations so this is perfect.  
I can’t believe the glow this leaves. For an extra special occasion I mix this with flawless filter.  
This just came my new go to
Run don’t walk!!! You will love it

I love this product! Super gooey, feels very natural and I am so happy that it is a clean product that does not irritate my skin!! 
I only have the smaller version but I’m going to buy the big one for sure!
it's not a highlighter, more like a primer. super watery but a little goes a long way

I received a gift card to select a product of my choice to review and I chose this product!
I’ve always wanted to try this, and since summer is coming up I went for the sunglow color! I have a fair complexion and so I was a little nervous this might look like dirt on my face, but it doesn’t! It provides such a natural looking glow and is perfect for summertime when you have a tan. It’s very natural and doesn’t have any sparkles or glitters either, so it just makes for the perfect base product for a no-makeup makeup day! I wear this on it’s own and I love it. Will be getting the lighter shade for wintertime!

I’m obsessed with this stuff!! I use it under my makeup as a primer and I have gotten so many compliments on how smooth and radiant my skin looks. It dries down fast and doesn’t pill when I put it over other products. Worth every penny!
Very pretty, gives a subtle glow under foundation. My problem is the disgusting rose scent. It’s very strong. I just power through and glow.
Obsessed with this product, I use this whenever I wear makeup as part of my base! It gives me beautiful glowy skin
I absolutely love this - I use it all over under foundation and it makes me look dewey and refreshed!! Absolutely recommend.
Makes the skin look great.  No matter what skin type you have it’ll work great.

Let me start this off by saying I wanted to love this, however once I tried it that was no longer the case. The reviews about the fragrance are true but it smelled like natural flowers so if you have a problem with that I’d pass on this. I personally have very fair skin and this didn’t show up at ALL! Once it dried down it was just specs of glitter and looked awful, I usually like natural makeup but this was just subpar at best, I feel as if it’d look better on darker skin tones for a more natural look though
reviews.review_title: skip this if you have fair skin

reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this it was exactly what I wanted. Adds a nice natural glow
This stuff is phenomenal. I wear it almost every day. I have even just put this on over my moisturizer and got complements on how glowy my skin looked. I will never go without it.

I was unsure about this at first. It was not obvious that I was wearing it under makeup or on top of makeup. However, I learned to absolutely love it with time and wear it daily for work from home / nightly as a highlighter over makeup. It is so sheer and soothing. It has never caused me to break out. It is really natural and subtle “lit from within” look if that is what you are going for. It is not a blinding / glittery highlighter. I will be repurchasing when it comes back in stock!

I personally love it, particularly in the summer when all I am wearing is sunscreen, but if you wear any powders or foundations, this is DEFINITELY not for you. I was looking tired one day and used the Stila colour correcting primer, as well as a small amount of concealer and just touching my face with this took the product off. But if you want a natural little glow in some spots, it’s easy to use, dries down quickly, and doesn’t move.

i am a pretty light person (shade 3 in the saie slip tint) and i used the shade sun glow and i absolutely lovee it! i was iffy at first because i already have the ct flawless filter and it accentuated my pores and felt heavy on my skin and causes me to break out sometimes, but this is exactly was i was looking for i am in love with this. (i have combo leaning more to oily skin)

Love this product! It’s great on its own, under foundation or used as a highlighter! It does have a smell so if you’re super sensitive to scents this might not be for you. However, I wouldn’t say the smell is bad or overwhelming. It’s not my favourite scent but it’s not a bad smell either.

This this this!!!!!!!!! Beautiful absolutely stunning! It gives a beautiful flawless glow from within glow without glitter or shimmer. I just look an angel came down and softly kissed me. It’s perfection under face tint.
reviews.review_title: And the 5 day God said “Let there be Glow”

reviews.review_text: I LOVE this product. It’s the perfect natural glow look. Just the right amount of shine without being too sparkly!
Love this product! Extremely glowy without looking oily or feeling sticky! Super versatile!
Meh… this was really watery and didn’t do much for me.
Love using this under my makeup! Gives you a stunning glow from within

Amazing. 
AMAZING !!!! Usually I don’t even like to write reviews but this one was definitely worth taking the time to express how absolutely amazing this product is. It’s extremely lightweight blends out well, last a good amount of time and it tries down to the point where you don’t really feel it. usually I like the glossier halloscope but they left a tacky finish that I didn’t really like that part so I was still looking for a natural dewy look & I FOUND IT.
Love. Natural dewy glow with no glitter. Under or over makeup. Will repurchase.

I am OBSESSED with this highlighter!! It gives the most beautiful lit from within glow! It does not emphasize texture or make my face look greasy. My favorite way to use it is mixed with my foundations but it looks great on its own as well. I would recommend this for people that prefer a more natural looking highlight but it can be built up into a more noticeable highlight :)

I love this!! It’s so glowly, but not greasy! I use it as a makeup primer or by itself after my skincare everyday! I love the natural glow that it gives. It does have a scent which I try to stay away from but it doesn’t seem to irritate my skin so I’m okay with it! It’s so good!!

I love the effect this product gives me on its own, underneath makeup, and mixed with tinted moisturizer/light coverage foundations. Very pretty on the skin and love that it is a “clean” makeup item at Sephora.
reviews.review_title: pretty and good to mix in with skin tints

reviews.review_text: The finish is super subtle, not a chunky glitter which makes it super pretty under my base and on top as a highlighter! I don’t find it separates or makes my base look weird throughout the day. The only thing I don’t love is it has quite a strong floral scent that I can still smell throughout the day and I’m not big on floral personally.
i wear it as a primer for a glass-skin look. it is super thin and lightweight so it doesn’t get as oily as CT. also looks great on high points of the face
It’s very delicate and incredibly hydrating. If you’re looking to shine bright like a diamond, look elsewhere. This is more dewy.

This product is such a beautiful need in anyones makeup kit. I have combo skin and I was worried it would make me look oily eventually but let me tell you … I have used this mixed with foundations/tinted moisturizers as well as a liquid highlighter and it is BEAUTIFUL. I have worn for over 12hrs and no oily look.
It just made me look super oily instead of adding a nice glow. I tried it under skin tint and by itself, but it looked awful.

this is amazing under makeup for a glowy dewy look or one it’s one for a little color! it’s not a normal highlighter as it’s not super pigmented or sparkly but it gives my skin a healthy glow. i bought the darker shade for summer and plan to get the light shade for the winter!
A lot thinner than the CT Flawless Filter. Therefore, it didn't cover my redness. Also, I opened the product and there wasn't a pump tube...just a full container of product with no way to get it out.
reviews.review_title: Don't waste your time. Get CT Flawless Filter!

reviews.review_text: this product was blowing up on tiktok and I decided to give it a try dispute having textured skin and after a few different application methods I got it to work for me. I suggest either mixing it with your foundation OR using it on the high points of your face (under your eyes and above the cheeks to add light and reflection to that area). This can make everyone’s skin look beautiful.
It’s literally transparent. My sweat was shining more than the product. Don’t understand how this worked for anyone when it’s basically clear.
amazing! blends easily. mixes well and adds such a beautiful glow!

I cannot shut up about how AMAZING this is. I’m very into the clean girl makeup, and I tend to not wear foundation. I put this on my chin, Cupid’s bow, the bridge of my nose, all over my cheeks and under my brow and it gives the most incredible glow. It gives this illusion of glass skin and being naturally dewy! I usually wear blush on top of it and it still glows underneath. This is a must have!! Literally the greatest base product of all time.

I am actually obsessed with this product. I was skeptical and thought it was overhyped but it deserves ALL OF THE HYPE. I put a thin layer on my skin and patted on a little bit of light foundation and my skin never looked as good as it did with this product. It just gave me a dewy glow without making me look oily.

p.s (I tend to have combination skin and it get's really oily in the T Zone and cheeks, I went to an outdoor concert by the beach and My skin looked great all night!
super glowy and lasts allllll day long. huge bottle for 28 bucks so def worth it. the mini would probably still last several months! great product
This works perfectly on dark skin. it gives you such a natural glow. Using it under my foundation and it literally made me look so pretty.  this is exactly what I was missing in my routine.

one word: AMAZING. The product is bigger than expected and you get a lot of it, worth it for the price you pay. Two pumps are more than enough to make you skin GLOW like a star. One of the best liquid highlighters I've ever tried.
This product is STUNNING, and you get a lot of it. I’m impressed by the amount of product you get for the price you pay. A great liquid highlighter - going to be my go to all summer!!

Beautiful highlight! Really gives you that “lit from within” look. 1 pump goes a long way and the texture is similar to a gel. It blended nicely over my foundation and didn’t pick up a whole lot of texture. My only complaint is it’s pretty heavily fragranced but the look it gives me is exactly what I was looking for and it held up well through sweating at the gym so the perfume won’t stop me from using it
This gel highlighter is extremely versatile and boosts my normal make up regime. The formula is ideal for anyone with mature skin.
reviews.review_title: It’s gorgeous under or over makeup

reviews.review_text: I don’t care what anyone else says, I’m OBSESSED with this product. It gives my skin such a youthful glow, without a glittery or greasy appearance.
reviews.review_title: My new OG for all over and spot highlighting.

reviews.review_text: Absolutely beautiful. The colour is so nice and was super easy to apply with fingers. Stayed on all night and I was at a concert and super sweaty and it looked basically identical after 3 hours of sweating and jumping and crying. The value is worth it as well. Super shiny and illuminating but not overly sparkly. Just perfect.
This is a lovely product. It is shimmery but not shiny. It goes on smooth. I love it! Planning to use it in lieu of other skin makeup during summer.

works great as a highlighter or as a base, would be careful if you have oily skin though! after a few hours its well absorbed, but when first applied it is extremely dewy, which is great but if you’re skins already hydrated or naturally oily then i would use sparingly

I honestly am not sure if I am using this wrong but you cannot see this AT ALL on me. I wanted to love it so badly but it just disappears on my skin. I have a fair skin stone with a pink undertone and it just does not work for me
I really enjoy using this as a primer for my dry acne prone skin. It’s light weight and glowy without any glitter.

Does not pull with milk primers or tatcha primers. It blends well with skin tints (tried with fenty and tarte). I also love it on its own for a no makeup, makeup look. Would def buy and restock again. Gives vibes of the Huda beauty glow tint but more natural and less greasy looking.

Amazing versatile product! Super lightweight with a natural golden finish. I actually love this on my eyelids as it doesn’t crease and has such a dewy finish! 
I also mix this in with matte cream/liquid blushes and it’s stunning! I don’t even need highlight with that.

My only con is that when I use it as an all over primer it does accentuate pores with a foundation over it. So I use is super sparingly only on high points of the face and it’s beautiful.

I got a mini size in the Sephora Clean collection/bundle, I actually really like it to brighten and highlight, I’m using less concealer because of this because it more gently makes me look refreshed and awake, its not super glittery, more of a subtle natural looking shine which is great, I like the consistency much more than powder or stick highlighters, it is lightweight and mixes with other skincare well too.

this has a very natural and beautiful finish and glow. i use it every day sometimes underneath the charlotte tilburry flawless filter or just on its own and it is really glory and doesn’t leave any clumps of glitter. 10/10

So pretty and dewy, great for a natural everyday look. I love the glass packaging too, if feels more expensive than it is. The only drawback is the weird smell, but once you apply it that goes away fairly quickly!

LOVE LOVE LOVE!! Ugh this is so cute! I bought this on an impulse and I’m so glad I did! Very sheer shimmery highlighter that leaves a perfect dewy finish. I like it a lot for natural makeup looks (the my skin but better kind of vibe). Not a super intense highlight, so if you’re into that I would check out SAIE’s other highlighter but this is just right for me!

If you have fairer skin and want to add an extra bronze glow to your look - this is IT! It looks intimidating upon application, but it sinks in like a dream and sheers out to the most beautiful bronze glow.
Quite possibly my favorite highlighter. You get a TON and a little goes a long way. This offers such a fabulous glow and isn't too sparkly.

I use this product everyday regardless if I am wearing makeup over it. This gel gives such a nice dew to the face without it being too sparkly. The packaging is nice and heavy but the cap does come off easily.
No glow, application messes my foundation. Bad value for money

A little goes a long way here I use it mixed with my ordinary primer before I put on my foundation and my skin is seriously glowing but not in a sparkly glitter way just a lip from within way honestly this is one of the best purchases I’ve made this year from Sephora I think this bottle will last me over a year.
reviews.review_title: best bang for your buck - HUGE bottle

reviews.review_text: ive been wanting this for a while and i finally got it after i bought the slip tint, this goes on your skin like water and is so moisturizing. it's very light weight and gives a perfect natural glow. the packaging is very heavy and is very nice for the price. i would buy this over and over again because the finish of this is flawless.
Love the natural glow look. I don’t use makeup and this is perfect for me. ❤️❤️

I genuinely want to this give product 5 stars because it is so amazingly beautiful…. The only thing I would have to say is the SMELL. I have to hold my breath every-time I put it on… maybe it’s just me. I will continue to buy but SAIE please fix the smell!!!!
Gorgeous and very hydrating. I apply my hydrating sunscreen. Let dry. Then I used this all over before the Saie slip tint, and then used a bit as a highlight. Skin felt hydrated and glowy all day.

My order from the Sephora sale arrived today like 6 hours before I was going for a spray tan. I put some on my hands & arms just to play around & test it. Forgot all about it & went to get the spray tan & it is STILL glimmering haha! I haven’t used it on my face yet, but can absolutely give 5 stars for the life of the product on my forearms, let alone my face.
It’s not all long lasting it’s good for a few minutes but then I find it where it’s out I may have got a bad batch but it was not long lasting at all

I thought I hated this and was about to return it but wondered why all of my research told me to buy it. It was an error on my part. When I got the product I was so excited to swatch that I opened up the bottle and swatched it on my hand and thought that it was a glittery mess. My mistake was I never shook the bottle and I didn’t use the dispenser that it brought. Once I shook and used the bottle dispenser I got that beautiful glow that everyone raved about.

Great glowy gel you can use on top of or under foundation, or on its own. A little goes a long way, I try to use less than a pump for my cheekbones, nose, chin and under eyebrows. It can be a little gel-ly/sticky for my taste on some days, but it's a solid product

I honestly love how this looks on the skin. It's the most natural looking highlighter I've used, giving you a natural and beautiful glow. However, it fades away pretty quickly for me. Perhaps with the right setting spray, it could last longer. But it does make give you a great dewy glow.
I don’t care for this. It smells bad and it didn’t really look like much on my skin. I’ve seen that other ppl enjoy it so maybe I’m missing something

I used it on one side of my face to see the difference, but both sides looked the same, then applied makeup on top of it and couldn’t see any difference, even if you use it as a highlighter which i tried and it barely show you have to apply like 7 dots to actually see some glow and then it fades out.
reviews.review_title: doesn’t show at all Not worth it

reviews.review_text: I love this stuff. It has a refreshing feel and lightweight consistency, sits nicely under water-based makeup (haven’t tried it with silicone), and is not at all glittery—just glowy. Plus I fell asleep in this and when I woke up the next day bracing myself for a new pimple my skin was totally fine. Chef’s kiss.

This is glass skin in a bottle. If you love a natural looking dewy glow, this will be your BFF. The texture is super lightweight, so it wears well underneath makeup as well as on top and it lasts through the day and provides light hydration. I can’t get enough of it!
Love the smell and the finish. I wear this without foundation and it gives me a little pop of highlight.
Best of the best. Just buy. Natural glow. Beautiful worth ever cent
reviews.review_title: BEST highlight for natural look. buildable!

reviews.review_text: I just finished my first bottle & will go back tomorrow to get more. I use this over my drmtlgy spf 46 tinted moisturizer. and love the glow. The only issue was with the pump. When the bottle was half empty, the pump stopped dispensing product, so I had to unscrew the top & put this directly on my face via the pump tube. I love that the bottle is opaque so I can see there is still product left, or I would have thrown this out thinking it was empty, when there was stll quite a bit left.
reviews.review_title: Love it, but please fix the pump

reviews.review_text:
This product was almost perfect.

Pros: clean ingredients, beautiful for a no-makeup natural look, amazing on my oily acne-prone skin

Con: smells TERRIBLE once it’s on your skin. 

I really loved this product so much. I would mix it with my spf30 and apply to my face after a shower, and then apply 1 extra pump over my spf. I have VERY oily, acne-prone skin and this product made my skin look beautiful and natural. Usually when I wear foundation with primer and setting powder, my skin would be an oil slick hours later. But somehow, this highlighter alone mixed with spf would keep my face looking glowy and hydrated without any oiliness by the end of the day. Unfortunately the 1 dealbreaker with this product is that everyone around me kept saying I smell like beer after using this. I had bought several new products with this one and it took me a week to isolate the cause and find out that this 1 product was the culprit for the smell. Somehow I didn’t smell it but everyone else did. I always use this after I shower in the morning and I tried spraying perfume but the beer stench still lingered from this product, so I had to stop using it completely. Which makes me really sad because I really have never had better looking skin :(
Love the natural glow look. I wish it would stay on longer though for the price.

This product is perfect for a 'no makeup' look. It gives a very subtle glow that I personally cannot achieve through my skincare routine alone. I typically wear this product on top of a mineral sunscreen and Saie Dew Blush. It helps me look more alive and ready to take on the day. I also really like that the shimmer from this product is not obnoxious like other highlighters, so it can be worn daily and in a business professional setting. The product also smells amazing and a little goes a long way!
I love it leaves the skin so glowy all day and it looks great under my makeup

Honestly shocked by so many positive reviews. This did essentially nothing for me. I’m not sure if it’s because I’m basically the same color? But I tried this with my foundation and found it didn’t show through, I tried it on my body for a slight glow and you couldn’t tell, tried it just with my skin care and again it didn’t look like anything… Really disappointed for the price and how many quality reviews it had. I did give it two stars because typically things like this will cause my sensitive skin to have a bad reaction and I had absolutely no reaction to it at all. So if you have sensitive skin, I would recommend going to try this on in the store and see if the color works for you because then you will enjoy the product and won’t have a reaction.
reviews.review_title: Disappointed - Recommend to try in store

reviews.review_text: Honestly a pointless product. It doesn’t give me any more of a glow than my morning skincare does, and when it dries down it leaves tiny shimmer all over your face.
Literally a new favorite. I use it as a primer under my makeup, and as a highlight! I can’t get enough, it’s so beautiful. Definitely recommend!

I have repurchased the full size twice and the mini size several times. It is my go to! I mix a pump or two with a pump of glow recipe dew drops and apply it all over my face for a dewy, natural glow all over. I love it and have had it in my routine for over a year now!
This is such a natural, subtle highlighter! I absolutely love it. My only nitpick is I wish it had an applicator and not just a squeeze but that doesn’t take away from the amazing product.

I had a sample of this, used it and immediately bought the full size. Its very lightweight. As a primer it gives a nice glow. You can see if peak through foundation Thats it gives the right amount of glow. I’m also super happy that this can also be used as highlighter. It didn’t disturb my foundation. It gave a beautiful glow from within. But buildable.

I really loved this product when I was on vacation and needed a “sun kiss” glow. It meshed well with other products of mine too (under and over). Such a fabulous texture on skin and is not too dewy or matte. Excited to try more from this brand!

Got this as a sample and immediately bought a bottle after I used it! I can use it either as a glowy primer or dot it on as a highlighter and it adds the most seamless glow! No real color shows up for my skin tone, just the glow. The consistency is very thin, which is nice…And the bottle is HUGE. This will last me a long time! 

I have combination skin that tends to be a little more on the  oily side, not super sensitive usually and this didn’t break me out or anything.
reviews.review_title: Flawless GLOW and Great Bang for your Buck!

reviews.review_text: Now this was a surprise!  Too many highlighter type products are just too much. Too sticky shiny greasy sparkly not good at all.  This product seems to have different aspects.  Elegant useful and mostly just right.  It seemed to have subtle plumping almost primer like effect with nice levels of color.  Again elegant subtle truly glowy finish with nothing overdone. Bravo well done and will definitely buy again.
reviews.review_title: Very surprised from Unknown Product Line

reviews.review_text: The Sunglow is AMAZING. I'm a bronzer connoisseur and have been through many liquid, powder, and gel formulations through the years. This is the best by far that I've ever used. No "glitter"- just a very gentle, natural soft glow. This is indetectible- does not look like you're wearing anything but warms the skin absolutely perfectly. Agree with others that the scent isn't the best- it's slightly sickening actually - but fades within 60 seconds for me. Worth it.

amazing. i’m a model and this is the perfect blurring all over serum for a no makeup glow, or as a great primer to their foundation. and a highlighter that doesn’t move the makeup. i am in shock. 10/10
Leaves your skin so glowy and hydrated. I use this before the tinted moisturizer for that extra glow. Always get compliments on my skin.
Amazingly light & plumping. I have very dry skin and this on top of my skincare is giving me life. You need this ASAP.
Love this product for its clean ingredients, light texture and the dewwwwy glow it gives my skin. I use with a primer as it can sink in after many hours of wear.
Super glowy makes you look radiant and amazing. Great as a primer or on its own with some sunscreen
reviews.review_title: amazing as a base or on its own

reviews.review_text:
I love the formulation of this because unlike most highlighters it gives a slight natural glow instead of blinding metallic reflection or the dreaded sparkles. It goes on very sheer and weightless, feels like nothing. It's lovely if i want to not look like I'm noticeably wearing anything, but still want a bit of glow. It's probably not a noticeable enough highlight for some folks, but for my casual daily makeup look it's perfect. I left off one star because the sickly sweet fragrance of it is so strong and sometimes i get tiny pimples right where i applied it. 
 
I would love a version that doesn't smell like flowery perfume.
i put it on and it didn’t make any difference- no glow, no shine. if anything it made me look even more greasy- would not recommend.

AMAZING. I got this as a sample and immediately bought the full size. I mix this with my foundation and it makes my base look SO good. It also works really well as just a primer before foundation or any other cream products. You can also wear it on its own for a dewy look. Makes your skin so soft. I have not been this happy with my base makeup in years!

Love this mixed in with the Saie tinted moisturizer.  I add a few drops and use my hands which I am starting to enjoy because I can wash them every time and I can massage into the spots that the brush can't get to.  I will not be without it from now on.  Smells fine to me.

I love this product, I mix it with concealer or foundation to get a more natural/glowy look, and I also use it as a highlighter. I would give it five stars if it wasn’t for the horrible smell (hard to describe, but it has a kind of plastic/fake smell?)
reviews.review_title: loveee it but it smells bas

reviews.review_text: I didn't find this product to be a highlighter at all, just seemed moreso to make the skin appear more smooth but there was no dewy glow or highlight. The smell is also incredibly strong

Five stars aren’t enough! This stuff is absolutely amazing. I use after SPF and either alone or before my tinted moisturizer or foundation. It truly gives the best lit from within, glazed look without adding any weight or making you look shiny. I don’t have one bad thing to say about this - I go through it like water! Plus the price and how big it is is amazing.
Really a nice product to add glow to your makeup. Though it does have a glitter added to it which I don't mind.

Omg!!! I am absolutely in love with Saie Starglow. Glowy Super Gel!!! I wear it on top of my light moisturizer and it it makes my skin feel like silk!!! This is a must have for Everyone!!! I also love the scent. This is an amazing product and I highly recommend it!!!
such a beautiful natural glow!!! sometimes i’ll have this all over my face with a little concealer and mascara - such a pretty everyday look! get this!
reviews.review_title: if you want glow, you want this!

reviews.review_text: I mix two pumps of this with my foundation and it's GLOW TIME. I love the natural radiance it provides. It's like instantly faking that refreshed—just back from vacation—look. Definitely recommend.

I loooove this product. At first, it was a bit watery but you just need to shake it up to get the right texture and pigment. The rose scent is lovely and I really enjoy it. The glow it gives isn’t sticky and is beautiful as a primer or highlight
Such a beautiful product! Leaves you with a glow from within!! I use it under makeup, on top of makeup, & days where I wear no makeup!
Gave me the glow, but had a strong rose/chemical scent I couldn’t get over. Nice glass packaging.
I love this so much, sad I didn’t purchase earlier! It’s great on the face, and also on the body( chest, hands, collarbone). This product creates such a natural looking glow.

I like keeping my makeup super minimal and hate feeling like I’m wearing anything on my face. This has a skincare-like texture. The glow is natural but not too natural, it still attracts the right kind of attention. I am super sensitive and allergic to everything and haven’t reacted to this. I apply liberally to my cheekbones and the tip of my nose and I don’t end up looking like I used a dollar store makeup kit like most highlighters seem to favour.

Love this it a must have when applying my makeup! It’s very lightweight blends easily and gives you a beautiful looking glow! You can use this as a highlighter, or mix with your foundation to give you a healthy radiant glow! I took off one star only because I do not like the smell, but it does go away! Also it does have natural ingredients which is always a plus for me!

My skin was glowing! Lots of shimmer! Definitely dewy! Love the colour and there is no strong or unpleasant scent. I would have just loved for it to be more moisturizing (no dry spots at the end of the day of wear) and it would have been a perfect 5 stars

The formula is light and felt nice on my skin. Didn’t break me out which many liquid products can so that was an instant win. I wore this after moisturizer and under concealer & powder bronzer (don’t wear foundation) and it did give a little boost to my glow. Nothing major and so I’ll use this for special occasions but not daily and may or may not purchase again once I use it up. Smell was unusual but it didn’t bother me and disappeared after rubbed in. I’d recommend for someone with dry, dull, and sensitive skin for a subtle natural looking glow.

I absolutely loved the concept of this product and was extremely excited to try it on. My complexion is dark (South Asian), and the shade Sunglow did not show up on my face at all. I totally understand why this product works incredibly for lighter skin tones but I had to use 2-3 pumps just to see a glow, and at that point it just felt too heavy. For reference I tested the product as a highlighter, and an all over “primer”.
reviews.review_title: Sunglow for Sri Lankan Dark Complexion

reviews.review_text: So far, I'm loving this as my sole primer/moisturizer under Estee Lauder's Double Wear foundation!  I think this keeps the foundation from becoming matte..... flawless & helps with my large pores!!!  I think I'm on a roll now..... after many years of moisturizers, primers & foundations!  Must give this a try, ladies!!
Well it doesn't show much on my olive skin tone I had to put quite a bit of product to get it to glow and highlight. I'll finish my bottle but won't repurchase.

This is very much like the BECCA Backlight Priming Filter Face Primer that Sephora used to sell, but at a better price point. I mix this with my bareminerals complexion rescue tinted moisturizer, and add powder sometimes on my t-zone to minimize too much shine. I’m sure any other tinted moisturizer or foundation would look just as great. It could also be used as a subtle highlighter.

It's what I expected, and I like it! It's kind of a watery gel-like texture that's cooling (not because of eucalyptus but because it's a gel) and really nice when a little is mixed in with tinted moisturizer. It's pearly, but the shimmer is visible when blended out. It's quite pretty, but if you're looking for a very natural/pearly/moisturized look then it might not be for you. Thank you for the recyclable bottle!

Cute bottle. Thank god I purchased the small bottle. 
Once you apply after it dries it gives off a bed scent. I think it’s expired. 
Not purchasing this item again

I really love this product! It gives a similar glow to the CT Flawless Filter (without the coverage), and it feels super hydrating and light. I love the finish under my foundation. It can seem intimidating so I always warm it up in my hands first and it works great. Don’t like the scent but it tends to fade away (doesn’t linger) once I’m done with my makeup.

This is not strong/intense enough as a stand alone highlight, but I’ll give it 2 stars as it is usable mixed in with SPF or tinted moisturizer for a soft, luminous glow.  The smell, however, is terrible.  If you cannot tolerate foul smells, do not buy this.
reviews.review_title: soft glow when mixed in, but foul smell

reviews.review_text: Beautiful glow! Very light and blends in easily. Is subtle but also can be built on.
Was told I looked glowy! Great as a highlighter on high points or all over face.
This is a wonderful product!! I love the way it blends into my skin and makes it look refreshed. My only wish is that it would come in a larger size. This has become a staple in my beauty bag.

The smell isn’t the best (herbs?), but I can overlook that because it gives me the prettiest dewy glow! I was looking for a highlighter that would mimic dewy skin and this is it!! There are no glitter particles so it just looks like you have healthy skin. I found that the best way to apply it is to tap it on with a sponge because when I use my fingers it doesn’t look as nice

I absolutely fell in love with this product. It doesn’t have glitter or shimmer it just gives the most beautiful glow from within. I’ve used it on it’s own over moisturizing and as a highlighter over foundation and both ways  looks beautiful. It is a lighter champagne shade and I do think it will work for all skin tones. I tap it in with my fingers for a more intense glow or I will use a beauty blender for a more defused glow.
The BEST glass skin highlighter. I use a little before foundation or as highlighter. So dewy without being a chunky highlighter.

I use this dewy highlighter after primer and before foundation. It gives my skin a nice and natural glow. The consistency isn’t sticky or anything like that. It’s like a moisturizer! So good and it’s a staple in my makeup bag.

This blends well, doesn't appear to be on your skin in any obvious way and it feels good too. It's hydrating, light and glowy whether alone or under makeup. Love this brand and this product. I look glowy and not highlighted. Ingredients are clean and skin care worthy Take a chance and try it.
Just..meh. The formula is confused about whether it wants to be a moisturiser or a highlighter/luminizer. Fails on both counts.
AMAZING! Gorgeous glow from within. Can apply under, over or mixed with foundation it looks incredible no matter what. New holy grail!!

This seriously surprised me. When I swatched it I wasn’t blown away. As soon as I applied it I couldn’t believe how beautiful it looked. Such a natural beautiful glow. No sparkle, just glow. Very lovely. Highly recommend.
Beautiful lit from within glow. This is good on top or underneath makeup for a natural look.

I love how versatile this product is. You can wear on its own just for glowy fresh skin. You can use it under your foundation as a primer. You can even put it on top of your foundation as a highlighter. It’s very light weight and doesn’t have a noticeable smell.

I purchased one bottle, used it first time, I was like wow is this real? The second time, mixing it with my tinted moisturizer: holy cow my skin looks like I’m the healthiest person in the world. Third time mixing it with my foundation: everything glides so smoothly and stay glow!!! Then I bought three more bottles LOL

I got this as a sample with my last Sephora order and will be purchasing a full size once I'm done. As someone with dry skin, I enjoyed the gel texture and found this to be a very subtle highlighter. If you are looking for a highlighter that packs a punch then this is not it, but if you prefer a more natural look then I think this is a great option. It's very pretty and lasts a surprisingly long time.

This product looks gorgeous in and out of the tube, but it didn't seem to do much for my skin or my look. Since I could see particles of mica in the product, I would probably only wear this for a fun special occasion like a party. 

Pros: It is a beautiful, creamy, light-reflecting gel, and it does add a nice, subtle glow to the high points of the face. Luminizer is a good description for it.

Cons: It seemed to accentuate my large pores. The Starglow color nearly matches my skin and made me look perhaps dewy, but pale and without warmth. I was also a little bit surprised that I could see particles in the product-- I guess these were mica. I feel like the stock photos depict a smooth gel with no particles, so this was surprising and makes me less likely to wear on the regular.
reviews.review_title: Very pretty but does little for me

reviews.review_text:
This is the best product I’ve used in a  long time. I’m not a huge makeup person but I like to look nice and natural everyday and this leaves me glowing in the Florida sun, looks super natural. Most importantly though is I believe in this company so much and am so grateful that they are a clean brand. They care about sustainability and the ingredients in each product.
The best

This was underwhelming. I guess I was expecting a highlighter because that's in the name of it... But it's like a super thin shimmery moisturizer instead.
I don't trust positive reviews anymore. Everyone was given the product for free or they were paid or they work for the company. Click verified purchases only and 90% of the reviews disappear. 
I was expecting something more like charlotte tilbury liquid highlighter in the tube, I guess?

But when I applied this like I would with actual highlighter it just blended out to nothing. I put it on the top of my cheekbones and i could barely see it. I just kind of looked sweaty?  I don't get it the appeal. 
You get a ton of product for the price I guess considering youre not gonna use this like foundation, you're supposed to mix it into stuff. But I dont want or need shimmer all over my whole entire face, so I'm not mixing it into anything. I use targeted precise highlighter only. 
It thins out and spreads easily over your skin, like a very light weight moisturizer, and dries down fast. But it's almost like you put nothing on at all. And the shade is like almost my actual skin tone, maybe darker, so it just doesnt make sense for me personally.

Maybe this would work for someone who has dry skin, wants tons of all over iridescence, and has medium to tan skin.  I'm N0-5 and this just doesn't "highlight" me.
Imo, it shouldnt be marketed as a highlighter, they should just call it a luminating primer. I can see how this is almost a dupe for the hollywood flawless filter by charlotte tilbury(tons more shades), and I hated that too, but at least the marketing for that was clear. It's like a subtle shimmer filter.  After an hour I literally couldnt see it anymore, the tiny amount of other makeup must have covered it up.
I am over these hyped up products that dont do anything.

I love this product and I've repurchased several times! It leaves such a natural looking glow that doesn't sink into fine lines. The texture is gel-like and feels really hydrating. I often wear it alone when I don't feel like wearing a lot of makeup.
The smell in this product is terrible. Will be returning
I thought this was a primer lol! Excelent primer but if u have oily skin might make u look a bit oily, i dont think it works as highlighter tho tooooo light

I received this as a complimentary product and I am very glad I did because I probably wouldn't have bought it otherwise. This is a great product, but it depends on what you are looking for. I have been using this for about 3 months now, and after testing it multiple different ways I have found the way I like using it best. I am a highlighter girl, so I like my highlight to show up, but I would say this product isn't necessarily a traditional highlighter. It looks best (for me) when I mix it in with my moisturizer and/or liquid foundation. This is more of an all-over-glow instead of a highlighter. I can see where other people are coming from in the sense they thought this was a shoddy highlighter, because I actually don't like it for that purpose either. It doesn't really show up too much. If you are a very natural highlight type of person, then you might like using this product as your only highlight, but I like it as a glowy mix-in to use with my foundation. I love the beautiful, slightly dewy glow it gives me, and my skin doesn't look oily or glittery, just fresh and vibrant. I still use a powder highlighter to give me the strobe effect I like. I gave this 5 stars because the product lives up to its claims and doesn't make my skin look shiny or break me out. I will purchase this product with my own money when I run out.

Ordered a mini and then purchased a full size because I just love this. Makes my skin look glowy without being too shiny or glittery. I prefer to use it all over rather than as a targeted highlighter.

I really love this!! It’s subtle, so if you’re looking for blinding or sparkly then you may want to pass. But it’s great for people who like a more natural, dewy look. The texture is interesting, not quite liquid, not really a gel. It’s not sticky, which is nice. I use it both over and under my base (usually a CC cream), and it gives a nice, dewy glow.

This product is so watery in texture and doesn’t adhere to my skin. It  just doesn’t show up. It removes the product (foundation, blush skincare) that was beneath it as well. I truly don’t understand the hype. It’s a useless product and I never reach for it. I need to find someone who will take it off my hands so the money didn’t go to waste. My other highlighters define my cheekbones much better and actually reflect light. This one does nothing.
reviews.review_title: Saie highlighter does nothing for me

reviews.review_text: Nothing special. Barely any highlight in it. I ended up returning it

First received a deluxe sample of this which I LOVED. I probably never would have purchase the full size had I not gotten the sample, and I’m so glad I did! A great natural glow and there is SO much product in here. Glad to have it in my arsenal.
Love this product.  Does the job better than my very expensive illuminating primers
Love this! Perfect consistency and finish!  Doesn’t make me breakout.

The product alone I would give 5 stars. Beautiful natural glow. But the smell is so horrible that I’m giving it 2. It’s a very strong floral scent that lingers. Idk why anyone would want floral smelling highlighter lol especially when he’s BAD floral. Had to return , but If they remade it without the fragrance I would 100% retry
I’m obsessed!!!  All glow, no glitter!  Great all on its own or mixed into foundation

Should last a long time as a little of this product goes a very long way. Seriously, don’t push the plunger all the way down or you’re just wasting it. Smoothes on easily and leaves a beautiful, subtle glow. Not for you if you want your highlighter to be seen from space. This isn’t going to make you look like a disco ball. This will catch the light but keeps it natural. 

Almost, ALMOST a perfect product. Had to remove a star for the weird smell. This product stinks but the smell dissipates after application.

It’s so hard to find a liquid highlighter that is subtle. Normally they are filled with glitter/pearl or make you look like a glazed donut. This is so natural and hydrating. Exactly what I was looking for

I was not expecting this tube to be as big as it is. I feel like it’s going to last me forever. The formula feels so good. I use this as highlighter, under my makeup, or even alone. Really love Saie products

This is a GIGANTIC amount of highlighter. It’s really pretty and a very elegant, subdued effect. You could probably use it as a dewy primer/base highlight to liven up a matte foundation. I wish the packaging weren’t so bulky. Also, it’s very heavily scented which puts me off

Absolutely love this! I use it on days I don’t want to wear foundation but still want to put effort into my look! It gives me a beautiful, subtle glow. I’ve been looking for a product like this for years! I hope they never stop making it!!
Got this as a sample. Love the texture and the look of it. Applies easily on top of makeup. BUT it smells AWFUL. Like cheap baby powder. As a result, I would never purchase or recommend to purchase.

I recently hopped on the Saie train and this is the first product I tried in starglow mini. It feels so luxurious to use and applies really well w my elf blending brush or fingers, going on smoothly with my base or as a highlight. It is very subtle but provides a glow without glitter or too much shine, and a little goes a long way.

The shade is super pretty and gives such a nice glow. However, if you’re buying this to use as a highlighter (rather than to mix it with foundation or to wear it under makeup) I wouldn’t recommend it. It says it can be used as a highlighter on top of your makeup, but it ALWAYS takes off my makeup underneath. I’ve tried blending it with a beauty blender, brush, and my fingers and it always noticeably takes my makeup off where I apply it. But to be mixed with foundation it’s super pretty. I had just bought it to use on top of my foundation as a highlighter so a bit disappointing

I use this both prior to putting on makeup, and as a highlighter. I like it more under my makeup - I wouldn't say it "primes" my skin, but it gives it a really lovely lit-from-within glow as I use CLE's ccc cream ontop of this (not sold at Sephora but highly recommend it). It works well as a highlighter too, but pretty muted on that side. For purely highlighting purposes, I'd purchase rms's highlighter in the future over this, but I still really enjoy it!
It’s ok you can get same soft shimmer with the Sephora clean glow stick $10.00. That’s why the 3 stars but product itself is great just a bit slippery color esperares from formula so shake it.
reviews.review_title: you can get same 4 less see my review

reviews.review_text: I do not see the hype around this product. Other highlighters are so much easier to use and work much better. Can’t back this cult favorite.
the prettiest glowy base! beats out CT hollywood flawless filter

I’m in LOVE with this product. I want nothing on my skin , this is perfect mixed with my sunscreen. Gives me the glow and moisture I want. I work really hard on my skin and not wearing a ton of makeup, I really love this product. Makes your real skin look and feel good. Can’t wait to try more from this line

This stuff is AMAZING. It leaves your skin with a natural dewy glow. I have dry skin and this is like a hydrating serum-makeup hybrid product. It feels so nice and light on the skin. 

A little goes a LONG way. I like mixing a small pump into my moisturizer for an all over glow. Or if I want to tone it down, I just dot it onto the high points of my face (like highlight). 

I have tried both colours and I prefer the sunglow (gold) colour as it looks more natural on my skintone (tan). The other one shows up like a silver/white colour on my skin, which I personally don't find flattering on myself. 

All in all, I highly recommend for a natural dewy glow!!!
Wonderful natural glow. I usually use it as a primer but when I want the extra glow, I mix it with my foundation. Easy to use. Non greasy, non silicone feeling.

This product is the most effective but still natural/‘no-makeup’ highlighter I’ve ever tried. I’d say the closest product comparison for how to use this would be the Charlotte tilbury Hollywood flawless filter. It can be worn alone all over the face, as a primer or mixed with foundation, as a subtle glow over foundation or just on naked skin. It’s super pretty as it doesn’t have an insane amount of shimmer, but somehow doesn’t look sparse or chunky/glittery. It just makes skin look like it has a bit more plump and glow to it. If you want a blinding liquid highlighter, this is not the product for you. If you want a more multi-purpose product that can do some multitasking for an easier or quicker makeup routine, to look more natural, to be used in a less product-heavy routine, or whatever else along those lines, this is something you should definitely try. I got to know this product by using it a few different ways on a few different occasions when I just had a sample of it, and I loved it so much I bought the full size. A tiny bit goes a long way, so one bottle could last you a very long time. It’s so nice and subtle I’ve mixed it with some lotion and put all over my collarbone/décolletage to get a nice glow over my tan. It’s really nice! For what the product is and what I use it for, I really really enjoy it.

This is definitely not a highlighter, so this isn't the best product for dabbing on to cheekbones. It is very very subtle, and I personally like it best applied before foundation, in the areas I would typically highlight. Really good for daytime glow with a more natural makeup. Don't buy for nighttime-glam highlighter glow.  All in all, I like it, don't love it or need it. The $15 "mini" size is a really generous size.

I received a same of this product from the GWP clean beauty sample bag. This product has a gel-like consistency with fine sparkles making it really easy to apply and beautiful at first. However after about an hour or two, the glow literally disappears. It also has a weird smell like cheap children's makeup or like someone else mentioned, ballpoint pen ink.

The first time I put this on I went out on a date with my boo, who exclaimed “you’re glowing!” the moment he saw me. I’m wearing less makeup these days and this product has a light touch that feels sexy, fun and very “me but better.” Has a pretty, shimmery finish in a lightweight, hydrating formula. As the founder suggests, talking a bit on the skin does wonders for the face on Zoom calls.
I thought this would work over makeup but it lifts everything off underneath it. I didn't try it on a bare face because that wasn't what I wanted. Too bad. I wanted to like it but i did return it.

Perfect for a true natural glow! For days when I'm wearing minimal makeup but want an actual "healthy" sheen on my cheekbones and bridge of my nose, I was looking for a product that didn't look like a product, and this is it! It looks a little shimmery on the hand when I swatched it, but upon application to the face, it was perfect and exactly what I was looking for. Its basically invisible on my skin tone and gives the look of heath and hydration. Get the mini if you're interested in the Starglow shade because it will last quite a while!
reviews.review_title: The look of health and hydration!

reviews.review_text:
I received this product as a part of a gratis package of clean makeup from Sephora's @TeamBIC, which was a lovely surprise! However, I will review this product and all other products in the package in an unbiased way to the best of my ability.

When I first opened this product and swatched it, it really reminded me of Glossier's Futuredew, which is advertised as an "oil serum hybrid". The two products are very similar in that they're both serum-like products that provide a sort of glow all over your face. They're also extremely similar in price; the Saie highlighter is $25 for 1oz., and Glossier's Futuredew is $28 for 1oz. (but it's significantly cheaper if you buy it in a set with other products, or if you buy it during their Black Friday sale!). 

However, there are a couple differences between the two products that make me like Glossier's Futuredew slightly more. While both products provide a highlighted look for the face, this product is more of a glittery shimmer, whereas Futuredew is more natural, with a glowy sheen. Also, since Futuredew is an actual serum for skincare, it's super moisturizing as well, which is just an added bonus for me, since my skin is dry. But if you have oily skin, I'd actually recommend this product over Futuredew, since your skin probably doesn't need all the added moisturizer of Futuredew!

Another thing about this product is that it smells like pollen, which sounds strange, but when I had my friend smell it, she agreed with me. Since it's a clean beauty product, there's no added fragrance in it, so it must be coming from something natural in the formulation. If you're fine with that, then go for it! 

In conclusion, I think that this highlighter is a really great moderately priced option for someone that wants a sort of natural-looking glittery sheen all over your face - especially someone with oilier skin that wants a liquid highlighter, since often times, liquid highlighters can break people out with oily skin.

If you’re looking for a dewy natural sheen, this is it. I mix it with glow’s niacinamide dew drops and apply all over my face before foundation, or just apply on highlighting areas before foundation, or after foundation. I’ve tried more highlighters than I’d like to admit - liquid, powder, gel, cream....and this is it. This is the one I use daily. And a little goes a long way- I got 2 of the 50ml samples and used them daily on my entire face for over 2 months before they ran out and I had to buy the full size immediately because this is definitely a must have every day product for me. I’m pretty pale, usually like a fair-light in foundation shades and starglow is perfect but it seems it’d be flattering on a pretty wide range of skin tones since it doesn’t really have much color to it, it’s just a sheen. It’s not glittery either, it’s honestly perfect. I can’t say enough good things about it.
reviews.review_title: this is it - the only highlighter I’ll ever buy

reviews.review_text: this is truly everything I hoped it would be. its a great size, great texture! It feels like melting butter. love it soooo a little goes a long way.
reviews.review_title: everything I hoped it would be

reviews.review_text: It’s subtle, lightweight and yet adds such a perfect touch. I’m obsessed but the glass bottle is huge/heavy (not travel friendly but luckily I’m not going anywhere soon).
Applies nicely, the color is really pretty, it is really lightweight so if you wanted something that’s gonna be really visible this is not it, but overall a good product

Really loved this. I'm very pale, so after reviews stated that this was a very light glow, I was super excited. It lived up to the hype. I mix it in with my tinted moisturizer in the morning and it turns out perfect. I'm dewy all day after mixing it with my illuminating sunscreen. It does have quite a strong smell to it, but I didn't have any reactions to it with my sensitive skin. I really approve of the clean ingredients used in this line and find it is worth every penny. It will be an addition to my daily morning routine from this point forward. A small pump is all that is needed if you're going for light coverage. The pump does like to dispense a large amount at a time, in my opinion, so be careful to press it lightly if you don't want too much. The first time I applied to my face I accidentally put too much and it was an unnatural glow.
Love this light high lighter! I use it as a lightening primer before my foundation and I’ve loved it. It’s subtle and not over the top shiny. Smells great!

I love this! It’s really dewy and fresh. It looks amazing on the high cheek bones, brow, and centre of nose. It’s a really fresh look. It’s sticky at first for about 10 mins then settles, don’t be off put by that but also be aware of putting a T-shirt on straight away. I received the prod y sample using my points and have loved it so much I’ve just ordered a full size
reviews.review_title: perfect for a dewy fresh look!

reviews.review_text:
hi so i just got this in the mail after doing SO MUCH RESEARCH on liquid highlighter!! i couldn’t be happier with my decision!!! i haven’t used it on my face yet, but tested it on my hand and omg a little defs goes a long way. also i wanna note that my skin (specifically my hands) are insanely dry and scaly right now because i just got off accutane, and it’s not blotchy at all and didn’t latch to any dry spots! it tried nicely and isn’t transferring onto my fingers when i rub the top of my hand. super lightweight. super subtle but BEAUTIFUL glow. literally couldn’t be happier w this purchase. 

happy shopping!! <3
This is a very pretty, subtle highlighter but the smell! I can smell it on my face all day. It smells like ink from a pen. I don’t think I like that.

I'm a makeup novice, and I'm generally intimidated by makeup that takes a lot of time/tools/effort to perfect. I've been searching for a liquid highlighter that is easy to apply, stays on my face, and doesn't require scientific precision on my part to avoid looking like I bathed in glitter. 

This is that highlighter.

I use this daily, regardless of whether I use ANY other makeup. It works equally well on its own or mixed with foundation, and gives my skin a nice glow all day without looking or feeling greasy. Like other reviewers have mentioned, it is pretty subtle. It's perfect if you want more of a "healthy glow" than a high shine. 

For a novice like me, this is truly the holy grail of no-makeup makeup. If this product is every discontinued, I will personally drive to company headquarters and petition outside until they agree to make it again.

Originally purchased as a less intense cheek, nose, forehead and chin highlighter because with my combination skin a blinding highlight accentuates my shine  a lil too much (personal preference). This is veryyyy dewy and works better as skin illuminator for under foundation than I’d say a topical highlighter. The formula is still super nice, but on top of a full face it separates foundation a bit and looks kind of muddy. If u want a glow under ur foundation or just to combine w moisturizer it will do wonders! I still use it super frequently and do enjoy it on days where I’m not wearing a full face! And it smells amazing like flowers!!!
Love! Gives such a beautiful natural glow for summer

I initially got this as a sample and wasn’t sure what to expect. It is wasn’t as bold of a highlight as I prefer (I want to shine like glass most days) but it works amazing under your foundation. It gives you an incredibly dewy glow that is perfect for everyday wear. I still layer on some bolder powder highlighter to finish my look, but I love love this as a primer.

This is the best all over glow product ever!!! It looks so good on the skin without looking/feeling oily or greasy. This works for all skin types! I am a pro makeup artist and use this on almost every client underneath foundation on the high points of the face or mixed into the moisturizer. I personally use it every single day whether I’m wearing makeup or bare faced. Absolutely love it

I honestly had no idea what to expect with this product. I mean, I had an idea, but with my past history of not being a fan of gel or liquid highlighters, I was a bit apprehensive. But, my mind was soon changed once I managed to squeeze a drop on the back of my hand and see it for myself. It’s my new favorite instant glow product that turns anything into a glowy, dewy, illuminating product. It’s super lightweight and once you begin blending it in, it turns into what is best described as a water serum. The liquid absorbs quickly but it’s not greasy/oily nor leaves any film. The shimmer it leaves behind is gorgeous and the gel part adds that hydration dewy look: best of both worlds. It has a scent of flowers, which is lovely. And this works with so many different products: moisturizer, primer, foundation, etc. I never thought I’d love a liquid/gel highlight, but it’s one of my new favorite products so far this year. And Saie in general is one of my top new favorite brands I’ve tried this year. I highly recommend this to anyone who loves a lot from within glow or loves good for your skin makeup. A fantastic product, I can’t stop raving about it.

super versatile product, great to mix in with your foundation or just highlighting the high points of the face! the glow is real, and it’s reflective but not metallic which creates a “glow from within” look but amplified
also super easy to blend

I have this in the Starglow. I didn't have high expectations when I first tried it due to the fluidity of the product. For reference my skin can get oily especially in the warmer weather and humidity. This magical little highlight stays with me thrrough it all. It blends seamlessly, it layers without pulling off the makeup under it. A dot under the eyes makes me look like I slept 9 hours and went to the spa. A dot on the tip of my nose is still there after I take off my doggone covid mask that was glued to my face for an hour. It is just the right amount of highlight without glitter so I don't look like I just finished a concert with Jem and The Holograms.
I have the mini in my makeup bag now. Love this - so versatile and well priced. Treat yourself.

It doesn’t add much highlight and is more liquidy. It’s probably better to mix in with lotion or makeup for an overall glow. If you put it on over face makeup it’ll smudge and remove the make up you had on, rather than glide over it.

This stuff is so good.  I add it to moisturizer or tinted matte sunscreen. I haven't found another product that gives me a glow that I love....that doesn't look greasy or sparkly.  I love that they have a mini version too.  Makes it easy to try.  A little goes a long way!

I love the smell of Glowly super gel and how smooth this applies. I use it over my Saie slip tint or just over bare skin. It makes my tired, sleepless mom face look awake and feel pretty. it's not too shimmery and gives a healthy, summer glow!
Hands down my favorite product!  For someone who likes a no-makeup makeup look, this is perfect -- it's lightweight, hydrating, and gives you such a beautiful glow.
Love this. Gel formula so it doesn’t leave anything g other than glow behind. It isn’t glittery. Can be used before foundation, mixed with foundation, or as a highlighter.

I’m obsessed. My skin looks flawless and wherever I put it my skin looks like the sun is hitting it and it’s golden out so easy to blend and gel like it goes on like water and it sinks into your skin and gives this radiance. I hate glitter in my highlighter and this is not that it’s so glowwwyyyy just get it u won’t be disappointed it’s also big and pretty so I display it
reviews.review_title: U NEED THIS IN UR LIFE

reviews.review_text: It’s literally the BEST for a dewy, no-makeup-makeup look. It has a liquidy but very blendable texture with a beautiful sheen & bits of glitter. I mostly use it to highlight the high-points of my face, but sometimes as a base for a light foundation. It lasts all day and doesn’t cause my makeup to separate, either. The bottle is super pretty and the pump distributes the perfect amount. If you’re thinking about buying it, just do it- you won’t regret it! <3

I find that this just does nothing for me but put a few sparkles on my face. It’s kind of watery to me so you would need to put a LOT on for it to really give a good highlight to a certain area. And when you try to put it on top of foundation it just melts away the layers underneath so it does need to go under in my experience. Glad I only bought the mini- probably won’t buy again
This is definitely a great buy. Provides a natural shine that cannot be achieved with any other highlighter!!

This is fantastic. I got this as a sample and then ended up purchasing the full size because I found myself wearing it everyday and I couldn’t believe the compliments I was getting. Everyone thought the glow was amazing and ive recommended this to so many people, even my mom is wearing it now! It feels so refreshing as a final step in the skincare. It primes your skin so you don’t need foundation! I used to use future dew by glossier but I found it would irritate me and leave red bumps but I loved the look. This one is way better! No irritating, it’s got minimal ingredients and ingredients that do wonders for the skin! Love love love! This I anticipate being a life long product for me. Amazing. Just amazing! Definitely recommend!

I received this as a sample with one of Sephora’s offer codes and OMG I love this. As others have said, do NOT expect a blinding/strobing highlighter. This is that true glow-from-within tint. It’s perfect for work or regular days when it’s not ideal to be wearing ridiculously sparkly highlighter. I will be purchasing the full size!! 

It’s lasting me forever too - I’ve easily used the tiny sampler 15 times.

This product really does help give your face makeup a glowy/dewy look.
