reviews.review_text: Absolutely fantastic product, especially for no make up days! The color is gorgeous and seeps into your skin and gives off a radiant glow. It’s effortless. I will purchase this again. Great packaging and the pump works great! That is unusual, so a giant plus! Overall this is a product I would highly recommend to all if you’re looking for any easy and quick way to show off your amazing skin!
it's a much larger bottle than i anticipated and the pump dispenses a perfect amount. the texture is a really nice light liquidy gel that smooths on so well to give you a nice subtle soft highlight.

You will look like you’re  glowing from within! I would use this where I normally highlight my face (I wouldn’t use this all over, but I never highlight my entire face) and gives a very natural looking “is that makeup or not” look. There is no perfume smell but there is a slight scent of ingredients (inoffensive and goes away after a few minutes). Very beautiful and natural looking.

Ah! I just got this last week and am so excited. I mixed it with the slip tint moisturizer at first and wasn't satisfied. Once I adjusted it and put it on after my slip tint... it is exactly what I was wanting. It's light and feels great on my skin... added bonus to looking great!

I love how affordable this is, but its good quality. This looks great for no makeup days, it adds a natural looking dewy look. I enjoy adding this to foundation to add the lit from within look. I highly recomend this, the texture is perfect its not sticky. This was given to me free for review purpose.

Received this for free and love this item. I was worried it would be a bit sticky but it’s so smooth and leaves skin soft and and beautiful!! It gives such a dewy glow without looking glittery or super shiny. I would love to try the sunglow one as it’s a better colour for my skin tone so hope they release a mini version of it. I’m so excited to use this in my make Up. A must have for those who love a glowy, dewy look.

This is a beautiful, lightweight highlighter for that natural, glow from within look. I put it on under my Saie Sliptint, and it looks like my skin is lit up from underneath! It has a lightweight texture that just glides right on and absorbs quickly. I've also tried dabbing a bit of it on as my last step to highlight specific areas, though I think it works better as an all-over glow treatment rather than an area-specific highlighter. I have sensitive skin and this actually makes it happier! If you're wanting a super-sparkly, bright highlighter, this is probably NOT for you, but if you're looking for that natural glow, you've found it!

I would say this is a highlighter that is much more different than any other liquid highlighter I have ever tried. I love that most of the packaging can be recycled. I used this on my skin after my skincare, and it makes me look so wet and glossy, there is a slight sheen/shimmer, but it's not glittery or makes you look metallic in any way. My husband thought I need to dry off my face when wearing this alone. I didn't find that the highlight stayed on my skin too well on its own, but it made my skin look much more healthy and radiant. I tried it under foundation as a primer (CT Flawless Airbrush Foundation, Shade 6), and it made the foundation look so much more glowy but not greasy at all. I like mixing this kind of product with my foundation, but I found that since it's so watery, it made my foundation look a little more streaky, and it was harder to get good coverage. I also used it over foundation on the high points on my face, and it looked so gorgeous and lasted on my skin over foundation. The product blends so easily into the skin using fingers, brush, or sponge. I got a lot more coverage with brush and fingers than with the sponge. I highly enjoy this product and would highly recommend it. The shade I got was a good match for me.

With this product you can achieve the glass skin look without looking oily. The scent is on the perfume side, however after it starts to absorb, I notice the scent goes more softer. Instant hydration and I love that you can combine it with makeup and skincare products

This is a lightweight, water-based gel with a lovely pearlescent champagne sheen. It can be used as a foundation primer or a highlighter. I was pleasantly surprised with the results when I used this as a primer - first, there's the fresh, luminous glow that it imparts on my face – the “lit from within” descriptor is right - my skin looks healthy, bouncy and radiant; not shiny or greasy. I find for me, half a pump to a full pump is all I need to cover my entire face, depending on how much glow I want, and less if I’m just using it as a highlighter. I also noticed a slight blurring effect with pores and pigmentation from acne scars that I did not expect but am supremely happy with – my pores and dark spots don’t completely disappear, but they are less noticeable.  

I've now used this gel as a primer under a tinted moisturizer, as well as a liquid foundation and a cushion compact, and it’s worked beautifully in each case - zero pilling and my base makeup held up for the day without the need to touch up. The soft, natural radiance from this product really comes through the foundation to brighten my entire complexion. There's a nice slip to this which makes it very easy to apply; and, once applied, it absorbs quickly into the skin, without any tackiness or stickiness. A little goes a long way with this one, so a bottle will last a while.

Woah!!! Got this for free from Sephora, has never heard of or seen it before. I applied some of this mixed in with some hylaronic acid before my moisturizer, on my cheek bones and eyes and I am in love!!! Gives such a nice shiny dewy fresh look!!
Best primer in the beauty industry, it’s Gel— hello genius. No oily rez, I mean yes please and also thank you ☺️
The texture is gel like, goes on really smooth, blends well and It’s not sticky! Great for my everyday use for a nice light sheen, dewy glow!
reviews.review_title: Love this natural glow for everyday!

reviews.review_text: Gave my tired winter skin a glow! Love the consistency and that this isn't sparkly, looks completely natural

I have only used starglow a couple of times, but feel like it just may be better for someone younger. It seemed a bit too glowy for me and highlighted fine lines. I tried it under my slip tint and over. In my younger years I tended to be on the oy side and this made me feel like I looked too dewy, on the edge of oily. I'll use it for my decollete, shoulders,arms. Maybe legs?  I preferred the sunglow to this. But under the slip tint, not over. And I don't think I could use it alone. My skin isn't young enough for that.

This is so smooth and the perfect amount of sheen and highlight without being too shimmery. It glides on and blends in so well. I'll use it as a highlighter or under my foundation for a little extra glow.

I was searching for a clean highlighter and I'm so glad I read these reviews. It is beautiful! Very smooth application, and doesn't look too glittery at all. Makes me look overall more awake. I plan to use this with my lotion on "no make up" kinda days!

Mix with skincare or foundation for best results! It reminds me of D-bronzi from Drunk Elephant, but highlighter style. Adds a really beautiful, subtle shimmer to your face to make it GLOW! Took pic of my hand in the sun so you can see the half where it is applied versus the half where it is not. Love the ingredients that make your skin happy and that the packaging is recyclable!

I'm not a huge fan of "the glow" train/trend but this product changed my opinion completely. This is the most natural, versatile luminizer I've ever used...it comes out a watery consistency as described but goes on smooth and leaves my skin a beautiful tone as opposed to my pale, indoor quarantine, depressed complexion. The best quality is that I don't need any sort of foundation (unfortunately this forum only allows two pictures). This product lives up to everything it says it is and more! There are SO many glow and luminosity products it's honestly exhausting so I'm am so happy I had the opportunity to try this brand and open my mind to using this as a permanent staple in my routine. In my opinion, anyone, any age can use this and the price point is really good for the results it provides, definitely worth it!
I use in the morning - leaves me glowing w/o feeling greasy - love!
Smells like stale beer. Too much shimmer. You have to use slot to get it to show. Irritated my skin made it feel like it was burning.

I love how versatile this highlighter is! It blends well over top of foundation and doesn’t leave it cakey looking the way other liquid highlighters sometimes can, and as a standalone highlighter it really pops. I mixed it with my foundation to give a dewy finish and it looked so lovely and glowy. Photos show the swatch test on my hands combined with my foundation (Too Faced Dew You in shade Snow) and then the foundation by itself on the other hand. SUCH a big difference in the glow even with a dewy foundation! Really like this product
I love how lightweight this is and it really adds a nice subtle glow. I appreciate that it’s not over the top with glitter or sparkle. Love the packaging too and you get a lot of product!

Absolutely LOVE this stuff. I mix 1-2 pumps with my foundation and my skin looks amazing. Gives a beautiful natural glow. Doesn’t feel sticky at all. I love that it’s 75% water, so it goes on the skin very easily and smooth. And the Ingredients in this product are good for your skin, and didn’t break me out. Will be purchasing again and again!
Love this! I was skeptical but mixed it with my foundation and I have the most natural glow! Skin looks so healthy and gloat and very natural!
I am in love with this product! Most days, I wear Starglow just on top of my moisturizer and it gives my skin a light fresh glow. It’s easy to apply and very lightweight.

I’m so happy Sephora now carries Saie. Wonderful glow, lightweight not sticky. Mixes well or fresh look on its own. Starlight is perfect natural glow, no overly obvious shimmer vs just fresh. Anxious to try other products that others love as well!
I love it. So easy to apply and gives such a nice lit from within glow
There’s no better highlighter! This makes your skin luminous and gives your skin the just showered clean bright skin effect!
really nice! I have tried both Starglow and Sunglow and like them both. insanely glowy.
I absolutely love this highlighter. I use it under my foundation, on top, everywhere really! It's so sheer and light, and gives just the right glow. Cannot recommend this enough!
Obsessed with this gel. I apply before and after my tinted moisturizer and foundation and it gives the most gorgeous dewy glow.
reviews.review_title: The gel highlighters or your dreams!

reviews.review_text: I love this! It gives my skin a nice beautiful, luminous glow. On these dark cold winter days I need somthing to help brighton me up. Its very moisturizing and not at all greasy. I honestly use half a pump and its perfect.  I was concerned it might  aggravate my acne prone skin but it doesn't! Now that's a huge win. I also own the sunglow and love it!

My HG glowy base product. On its own or mixed in with a foundation/tinted moisturizer. This stuff makes my skin look so glowy and healthy and a little blurred tbh. I always get complements when I wear this, even just layered on top of moisturizer

The Glowy Super Gel provides such a nice base for layering the Sliptint on top! Makes my skin feel so hydrated and glowy, which is great since my skin tends to run on the dry side. I even like wearing it on it's own when I want a very minimal makeup look.

I love this stuff! Most days I wear it alone without any makeup, but if I am wearing foundation/skin tint I just mix a little in. It doesn’t scream HIGHLIGHTER, which I love, and it gives me the perfect balanced glow. I’ll definitely be buying Sunglow for the summer!
Gives my skin the healthy glow I want without being too obvious that I have highlighter on.

I bought this gem over the summer and it’s one of the best beauty purchases I made during the pandemic. Works like a charm for zoom meetings and impromptu video calls with coworkers and stuff. I completely forgo foundation and tinted moisturizers and just use the glowy super gel - my skin looks like perfection. It’s not shimmery or glittery, it gives my skin the perfect amount of what I like to call “grown up glow”.
reviews.review_title: must-buy if you love the glass skin look

reviews.review_text: This highlighter feels great going on and gives the perfect light glow. A bonus to this product is that it's made with clean ingredients.
So amazing! Gives my fair skin a great natural looking dewy sun kissed glow.
Glowy super gel is a spot on description. I’ve gotten so many “you look so glowy!” Compliments when I wear this.

Glowy Super Gel is actually what dreams are made of. I have sensitive and acne prone skin and this formula doesn’t bother me! I’ve tried many highlighting products and they have always been too much or not enough, this is that perfect medium! Lather this on your entire face for a healthy looking glow, mix with your foundation/moisturizer, or just use as a highlighter! You won’t be disappointed

Love using this under my Slip Tint for an extra dewy,
but natural glow. My skin is pretty sensitive and I haven’t had any issues with any Saie products. Love them all!

Glowy Super Gel is a HOLY GRAIL product! Seriously, one of the best glow products I’ve ever used. It leaves your skin dewy but not greasy, with a lightweight, hydrated finish. Both shades are great, Star Glow works best for my skin tone (though both shades are universal) but Sun Glow gives me a “just got back from vacation and in denial but at least I’m still tan and glowing” look. You can use it all over or just as a highlight. If you are hesitating, don’t wait!
This product is all around great. Nice formula and great to mix in with a tinted moisturizer or foundation.
lovely formula that gives a subtle warmth. I use it as a bronzer  it's very natural and subtle and gives that sun kissed look even in the dead of winter.

I'm really liking this so far. I usually put this over the slip tint--sometimes I just put it on my cheeks, other times I put it all over my face when I want to look extra dewy/glowy. I want to try mixing it with the new SPF that Saie came out with once I order it. It's a really nice formula--silky smooth and siRead more about review stating Really Nice Luminizernks into your skin. I sometimes look oily in my t zone, especially in southern Florida, but this absorbs nicely into my skin so that it glows without looking oily.
I had no idea if this was actually working or not until I wore it out and I received compliments on my skin. It’s truly weightless and doesn’t feel like you have makeup on.
reviews.review_title: Looking for glowing skin? You need this!

reviews.review_text: I’ve tried both colors of Saie’s highlighters. I love How light weight and buildable they are. I would like to see a shade in between the two they over with more of a rosy undertone rather than gold. Overall, it’s a great way to get a natural glow.

i wanted something that would give my melanin an added glow, i like dbronzi as its subtle but it has some ingriendts (macula oil) that aren't fungal acne safe. Saie is very similar to drunk elephants d bronze but i prefer d bronze, the saie is lightweight and has no acne inducing ingredients so thats a plus BUT it does seem a slight bit glittery in sunlight whereas Dbronzi is seamless and finely milled which gives a lit from within glow. the photos don't seam glittery at all but on the face and in direct sunlight, its sparkle city :/
reviews.review_title: a little bit glittery but shade is WOC friendly

reviews.review_text: My personal tip: don’t use this as your typical  highlighter where you only apply it to the high points of your face. Apply it all over for a glossy lit from within kind of look! It really looks less like makeup and more like the result of really good skincare.

Lit from within! This is a beautiful product and I can't recommend it enough. I use it under a light coverage foundation or use it alone before sunscreen and it leaves me with a healthy and natural glow. I don't know what I did without this product!
This has been a zoom call life saver! Makes you look fresh, awake and perfectly glowy on screen or in person. I use it every day!

Words can’t describe how much I love this glowy super gel. It is so nice on its own for that effortless glow look or works even better with slip tint mixed together! This gives you that sun kissed glow look while not being sticky, heavy or oily. I have oily skin and this gel glides on and lasts all day!
I love the dewy shine, the lightweight feel, the color, and the moisture this provides! I put it all over my face for a nice glow mixed with my moisturizer. I seriously love this stuff!!

I have been using this product for 7 months and it is my go-to glowy base. It’s water-based, so it is hydrating without feeling oily on the skin. Looks great under makeup or on days you aren’t wearing makeup. Not too overpowering either where it doesn’t look natural. Highly recommend!

I am very terrible at putting on make-up so I naturally go for the ... no make-up make-up look. Since I purchased this one, I honestly only wear concealer, glowy super gel and bronzer (since we wear facemasks now). I am literally obsessed and have gotten compliments on literally just my upper face, which is pretty hard to achieve during these times! Will purchase again when I run out!
reviews.review_title: Perfect for the no-make up make-up look

reviews.review_text: My holy grail product. How is it possible that one product makes you look like you did a whole makeup routine? It’s the perfect sun kissed glow and the texture doesn’t stick. I can’t say enough great things about this glow in a bottle!
Gives you that amazing glass skin + dewy look. Love it.
A multitasking, lightweight highlighter that doesn't make you look like a disco ball.  I love to mix this with primer, or even body lotion.  It's sooo good!

My favorite new product I've introduced to my makeup routine recently. I've been using Starglow for a while. This shade is my favorite and gives the perfect subtle glow. However, I recently started using Sunglow and I'm really loving the slight bronze tint. I use it as a highlighter or even all over my face. The Sunglow is great on eyelids for something subtle. Plus the packaging is beautiful (and recyclable).

I LOVE this product so much, it instantly became a holy grail product.  It's lightweight, hasn't made any of my skincare or makeup pill, and looks just as beautiful alone as it does layered.  The glow is unreal, but it doesn't come across as a shimmer or glitter at all. My current favorite way to use it is either completely alone over my regular skincare, or underneath Kosas Tinted Face Oil or RMS UnCover Up. My skin has never had a more healthy glow!

The beautiful packaging is the first thing you will notice! And then to realize it is all recyclable - wow! This dewy highlighter has a slight honey smell to me. It is a little slick if you are used to wearing powder highlighters but I would say this is a good liquid one to start with. The universal champagne color is light and can be used on eyes, cheeks, anywhere you want a little glow.
pairing this with your foundation/cover up makes all the difference. brings a glow to your face without being too shiny

Comparable to the glossier futuredew but better. It perfectly blends into your skin for an added glow before makeup or some days I wear it alone. The bottle is huge & use it almost every day and haven't even made a dent.

I adore GSG in both shades. I wear it every single day under Slip Tint. It's great on its own or as a primer. It feels so light and hydrating without being thick. It really sinks into your skin and creates the perfect no-glitter glow. Love this stuff, I've already bought it multiple times. I legit think it has improved my skin texture and hydration.
reviews.review_title: Great alone or under other skin care

reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product! I am slightly tan (in between light tan and medium tan) so I was afraid this shade would be too dark, but this product evens out my tone and is such a nice sheer dewy layer to my skin. It feels so soft and actually evens out my face while giving me a nice shine. I absolutely love it and love that it is a clean product with sustainable packaging! Highly recommend :)

Great product! I don't wear a lot of makeup and prefer a minimal look when I do so this is the perfect mix of that. Love how it gives a little extra glow in the winter months when skin is looking dull!
The perfect addition to a work-from-home makeup routine. Makes me feel alive even when I’ve just rolled out of bed.

I own both the Sunglow and the Starglow. They are both amazing. The Starglow gives you a nice dewy finish on your face. I love the slight shimmer. I use one of these every single morning. I mix it in with my daily moisturizer. The Sunglow gives my face a little warmth. I live on the east coast and during the winter, the warmth is needed! I highly recommend both of these product. They are game changers.

I love the versatility of this product! I’ve used it alone all over my face for to brighten up on those no make-up days. It works beautifully as a highlighter or combined with your primer or mixed with foundation. Applies smoothly with your fingers or a brush. A go-to product for all.
I am in love with this product. Especially during these winter months when my skin feels dry and dull, this gives it a total makeover giving me a fresh glowing look.

This dewy highlighter has the most beautiful shimmer to it. I wear it by itself some days and others I wear it mixed with my Saie Slip Tint- either way it gives beautiful illumination and I wish I had discovered it sooner! I also add a little to my decollate, it's just the right amount of glow to make a normal day a little more fun!

I love the versatility of this product! I usually mix it with the Slip Tint tinted moisturizer to get perfectly glowy, and sometimes I'll even dab a little more on for extra glow. It's also an incredible value; this bottle will last forever!

I’ve tried this a few ways, by mixing it in with my moisturizer for a bronzy glow and putting it where I would put my powder bronzer. Both ways work well and the color is perfect, adding a little shine but it’s not glittery. It really just gives a healthy glow!
Mix it with you slip tint and get a fabulous glow that lets for hours.  Well worth it if you want a lot from within look.

I love this!!! I put it on my face after primer but before foundation or skin tint and it gives me a lit from within glow.  Literally supermodel skin! The consistency of it isn't heavy at all and the packaging is super easy and convenient!!

Love how dewy my skin looks and brings my skin look fresh. Liquid gold! This is my second bottle and honestly a staple in my daily routine. Love to mix it with the Saie tinted moisturizer to elevate my skin. It’s a must have staple!
Glowy Super Gel is insane. I use Starglow and mix it with either Slip Cover or Sunvisor depending on if it's a makeup or no-makeup day, and it makes my skin truly glow!!!

I put this highlighter on over my tinted moisturizer and it makes my face look so fresh and glowy. I love the smell too! I’ve had similar highlighters before, like the benefit one, and it leaves a weird line every time I use it. Saie has figured out the right balance to make it look like a natural glow. I use this everyday now :).

I mix this highlighter in with my foundation and it gives a beautiful glow even under a light dusting of powder. I've also tapped it on top of makeup for that extra luminosity! I also appreciate the size of the product - you get a lot for your money.

I'm only taking 1 star off because I think the large bottle is going to last me a lifetime and then some... I see now they launched a mini version, which would get a 5 star review from me! Not glittery, just the perfect finishing touch for a dewy look!
I Love this product.  It is so creamy and lush.  It works just like you would hope.....perfect natural highlighter
This product is amazing. Not only does it leave your skin looking dewy and hydrated, but it also smells fantastic. It's the definition of makeup as skincare.

I tend to use this more as a primer or standalone face product than as a highlighter in the typical sense. It's not oily, goes on so smooth, and doesn't make you look like a strobe light - it just makes you look better somehow! Definitely not a "have to have" product but it will make your morning that much happier!
Obsessed with this highlighter. Glides on so smoothly and smells amazing. Leaves the freshest glow!
Love this one lots!! Primer and highlighter all in one. Gives my glowy beautiful vacation skin!! Kissed from the sunshine type look.

This highlighter makes you look like you’re glowing from the inside out. It applies so smoothly and creates a really radiant look. I love the texture and how it builds on other product. Highly recommend!
This highlighter is absolutely stunning!!! Looks amazing on a variety of skin types, & gives you a glow from within type of highlight— would definitely recommend!

This is my all time favorite Saie product. It smells so wonderful and goes on creamy. Once it sets it has such a light non sticky finish. I love the glow it gives me but most of all I love that it’s all clean products. Can’t get enough of this. I combine it with all different products. Sometimes air combine it with my foundation, sometimes apply it alone, sometimes mix it with a little face oil. All depends on what you like!
Very light and gives the perfect dewy light look for a no makeup day !

Water fresh glow. Sun Glow color gives sheer warmth. The “sparkle” factor is very fine and natural looking. No obvious glitter but helps to bounce light off your high points. Spreads easily. Love the packaging. Glass bottle pump feels high end. Worthy of countertop display and environmentally friendly to boot!

I usually don't like highlighters because I find most to feel too much for my preferred natural makeup look but like all other Saie's products, this highlighter works super well with my skin and enhances everything in a really beautiful way. It's builds well if you want more impact.

This product is multitasking magic in a bottle!! I adore using this as a hydrating glowy primer as well as a liquid highlight on top of makeup!! This leaves such a natural skin-like glow! Truly OBSESSED!!

I love this Saie highlighter! I typically shy away from illuminators as my skin can be quite oily in the T-zone. However, I've been wearing this luminizer mixed with Saie's Slip Tint and it goes on (and stays on!) beautifully. It gives a glowing, healthy radiance to my skin which lately has looked dull.

Beautiful formula & glow -- I highly recommend this product! Also, other oily- and/or combo-oily gals/guys, no need to worry about this making you shiny as it simply imparts a beautiful glow. Glad that we oily-skinned gals/guys now have a great illuminator to use!
Game changer!!!  Exactly what I needed to create a perfect dewy look all year round.  It’s the perfect last step to my beauty routine!!!!

This product has been a time-saving multitasker during this time of video calls and working from home. I really enjoy wearing Glowy Super Gel as my morning moisturizer and highlighter in one. It gives the right amount of polished sheen but doesn’t break out my combo/oily skin. I love that this feels like a balance of makeup and nourishing skincare...plus it’s clean!
reviews.review_title: Makeup and skincare in one great product

reviews.review_text: This is my favorite illuminating primer. It has the most unique, light-as-air consistency that is weightless on the skin and blends it immediately. It has a very soft illumination that has zero glitter in it. Very soft, wet look. Gorgeous all over the face or pin pointed on the high points of the face. Can also be used underneath, mixed-with, or on top of foundation. Incredibly versatile. Don't sleep on this!
reviews.review_title: The best soft natural glow with a weightless feel

reviews.review_text: This product is so incredible. It gives you that Dewy skin that only a makeup artist can do! I wear it almost everyday as it gives me that extra bit of glow in all the best ways. Its so sheer and lightweight as well.

I love this! It gives me a subtle glow, nothing intense, just the perfect soft radiance. $25 is pretty affordable as far as illuminating base products go, too! The glass bottle is luxe and it’s just all around a delightful experience to use this.

One of my favorite natural, glow from within highlighter. I layer it under tinted moisturizer. The formula is beautiful and doesn't make me look oily (I have very oily skin) just gives me the right amount of healthy glow.

I use this as a highlighter after applying my other serums and lotions like spf etc. It stays on, where you set it,isn't overly oily or thick, and doesn't over shine you making you look sweaty. However it is buildable and I think you could definitely use this on other body parts for a subtle shimmer which makes it diverse. It's also recyclable and clean, ingredient-wise, which I love!
This is such a great one. Makes my skin feel fantastic and gives me the perfect level of glow!

This is one of my favorite products to add magic to foundation.  It's not really a highlighter in the typical sense. Mix a little in with any of your favorite foundations, especially higher coverage ones, and it will make it better than you realized it could be. It isn't shimmery and it won't change the texture, but it somehow improves it with a little glow. It also has a very faint fragrance - maybe roses - when you apply it but it doesn't linger. Looks great on facetime and zooms....You can also layer on your cheekbones for some revival if you're feeling like you're looking flat - a little dewiness - not a shimmer.  Try it!
reviews.review_title: You don't have anything like this and you need it!

reviews.review_text: My favorite Saie product! It's super light and glowy, I always apply it right before putting on makeup.
Beautiful bronzey glow. I love to put it on underneath the rest of my makeup, or even just wear it alone! Moisturizing too!
Love the subtle, healthy glow on this and that its a clean makeup brand.

The BEST!  I couldn’t love this product anymore!  Perfect for mixing with your makeup or wearing on its own for the perfect glowy natural looking skin.  I receive nonstop compliments/questions about my skin when wearing this.  The fact that it’s a clean product is the icing on the cake!

I have never in my life gotten so many compliments as I have when I wear this! I put it on right after cleansing my face and layer Saie’s tinted moisturizer on top. It has a slight shine to it is that just makes you look radiant. Have been using it for 2 months now and no plans of stopping.
reviews.review_title: Buy this! Your skin will thank you!

reviews.review_text: This is fantastic for an allover angelic glow that feels weightless. Not an over the top highlight and you really can't overdo this one. I've used as a primer underneath the Slip Tint, and over the slip tint, with leftover on my eyelids. I'm on my 2nd bottle!

This stuff is amazing- how something so beautiful can be good for you is the new name of the game and I'm into it!  This gel is light and provides a very subtle glow that you can't help but love.  It is as the name states super light and super comfortable-- I don't feel like I want to wash my face right after putting it on which I usually do with any type of makeup.  I am looking forward to buying more SAIE! :)
reviews.review_title: Amazing SAIE I love their products!!!

reviews.review_text: Just started using this, but love it! I used it under a tinted oil and it really does add a great glow to your skin all over without being sparkly. The glass bottle also feels and looks so pretty. This may be my go to gift for a friend now cause it’s a unique product that would work for many complexions :)

Best glow-boosting product ever! The gel is so light-weight, but the glow payoff is top notch. This product smells amazing, but it is not overpowering at all. After application, my skin looks like I just had the best hydrating facial. It is not sparkly or over the top.
I cannot recommend this product enough! It’s lightweight, feels amazing on and gives you a natural glow!

Love this so much. First, overall packaging is high quality. Secondly, smells soooo good! Just started using it this week and I am very impressed by the consistency and color. This product definitely is the perfect balance of dewy finish without being sticky (which I’ve found was the common issue with other dewy products). It dries quickly and is buildable— which I love because I’m a dry/combination skin gal. Will be using this a lot, but a little goes a LONG way as far as this product! It’s good for quick on the go coverage and also for mixing with my current foundation! Love it

Love how this gel applies so smoothly and gives a perfect glow to my skin! I sometimes mix it with my tinted moisturizer for an all-over glow or sometimes apply to cheek and brow bones...anyplace i want a little light! All the Saie products feel great and are so clean.

I ordered this before COVID and found that is the best thing as it doesn’t wear off on masks.  It gives a great glow and is easy to wear and doesn’t bother my sensitive skin. I stopped wearing foundation daily and wear this- look fresh and so
glowy!  On my second bottle now- love it!

Few things feel as good as having really luminous skin!! It’s been hard to find an all-over highlighter that looks subtle, but this fills that role for me. Gorgeous touch to any beauty routine to get that really WOW wow wow skin. A keeper for sure :)

I've been using the products for 2 weeks now. I'm completely obsessed. The consistency is perfect and leaves a really natural glow. 

But, make sure to wash your hands after and to be careful when putting clothes on - it can transfer !
reviews.review_title: Glowing in the middle of winter

reviews.review_text: Obsessed with this product.  It is so light on my skin, but provides that dewy glow it is impossible to find in the winter.  Can't wait to see how it looks with a tan.  Even better I'm sure!
reviews.review_title: Dewy Glow I've Been Searching For

reviews.review_text:
LOVE THIS HIGHLIGHTER!

This can be applied across the entire face as a base under a foundation, or alone as highlighter. It is a lifesaver during the winter when my skin needs a boost in looking moisturized and vibrant. Love this product, and packaging. Feels so luxurious, and yet still fun to use!

This is the all-over highlighter I spent years searching for!  It is lightweight and comfortable to wear.  It gives the most gorgeous glow - not sparkle or glitter as so many others do.  It's the effect you see in the photos in fashion and beauty magazines.  I will NEVER be without this product and have ordered the Sunglow as well.  It pairs nicely with the Dew Balm, too - for extra fabulousness!

I love, love, love this product.  Gives an amazing glow!  I use it all over my face under foundation when i want to make an extra effort.  When i am rushing i just pat it on over my make up anywhere i want some glow (cheekbones, etc).  Love, love, love!

I love this stuff! I've bought this on my own and also receieved a sample of both shades, and this gel is incredible.  It's gorgeous on it's own, leaves me glowing and moisturized, and really mixable. I apply this after my skincare and before my tinted moisturizer or foundation.  If I don't feel like putting any makeup on, I'll apply this and my spf.  It's really worth trying!
This is a fantastic product!!  Light weight but gives a nice glow.  Love it!!

This was the product that introduced me to Saie and I haven't looked back since!! I use as a base layer for that lit from within glow and then go back to highlight the usual point after finishing the rest of my face. It provides a beautiful finish that looks natural and dewy. Feels so light on, makes my skin feel refreshed all day, never dries out. Have been using for a year now and will never let myself run out, I've introduced to many people and have only heard praise from them as well. Seriously, buy this.
I love that all their products give such a natural dewy look. this highlighter is subtle. Which is perfect for an every day glow look!

Love this stuff! I have both starglow and sunglow, I use it everyday to give my skin a nice glow. And I always add a pump or two to my slip tint on days I need more coverage but want that dewy glowy look.

this stuff is amazingggg
dab a little on everyday and it gives your skin the perfect look of freshness - love this stufff

Prettiest thing ever. I haven’t switched up my makeup routine in awhile but this is the exception. I like to mix it with my moisturizer and it gives me an iridescent glow. I ordered the shade “sun glow” and honestly, the name speaks for itself. There’s a subtle shimmer that sits on the skin nicely and gives an almost dewy look which I love. But you can put powder on top if you don’t like the dewy look and it will still maintain that nice glow. I don’t write reviews on here ever. But this. Wow.

This is the best product I never knew I needed. I have in both shades and go back and forth on which I like more. I love wearing alone on days where I want less coverage but still something to feel put together. Such a subtle glow with no "glitter" effect. Very pretty and natural. On other days I will mix with Slip Tint and they combine super well for light coverage with a little something extra!
Must have if you are looking to achieve a dewy look! So silky and smooth and application is a breeze.
I love this product so much! As someone who is pale it gives me the golden bronze I can't actually get from the sun!
reviews.review_title: THANK YOU SAIE FOR THIS PRODUCT!

reviews.review_text: This is my favorite Saie product! Love that it’s clean beauty, and I use it every day. Even if all I put on is sunscreen, I’ll dab a little of this on my cheeks. Also great layered with bronzer, foundation, and blush. Definitely recommend!
I love the Saie Glow Gel! I have it in both shades and they’re both amazing! I always get compliments on my glow when people see me wearing it!

Such a great highlighter but my favorite way to use this is as a base! I have both colors and either mix 1 pump directly into tinted moisturizer or apply alone before. I sometimes dot this around my brow bone for added highlight. Blends like a dream and is so breathable. I love the subtle glow it gives! Reminds me of the Burberry highlighting primer but clean and better!

I love this product. I use it every day over the Saie Slip Tint. Just one pump, lightly apply around my cheekbones and forehead. So easy! No need to be perfect with this lightweight product. It adds a gorgeous, light glow that looks great IRL and onscreen. This is one of my favorite daily use products. I highly recommend it!

I can see where this product shines but it wasn't totally what I was expecting. I was expecting this to be a more dewy finish product with kind of a wet look to it, when in reality this dries down and leaves a very satiny finish. It's definitely not matte but not super dewy - it has a more polished, soft glow look to it. This did not mix super well with moisturizer because of the dry-down quality, I think it will do best on its own as a base layer or under foundation. If you wear it on its own, warning that creme products didn't blend great over this (again) due to the dry-down. I will absolutely wear this under foundation when that's a thing I do regularly again! I received this product complimentary for testing purposes.

Love! I wear this year round. It layers well and mixes perfectly with moisturizer, spf, etc. It doesn't matter if I'm tan or not, always leaves a somehow perfect glow. Apply all over or as a highlighter!
I love this product! I add it to my primer or tinted moisturizer when I want to feel dewy and glowy. Makes me feel fresh and fancy plus it's clean makeup which is a major bonus!
Love how this gives me a bit of glow that looks natural!
I love the finish, just wish I had gotten the other shade. I'm pretty pale and hesitant to use too much as I'm not looking for an overly bronze look
AMAZING product. you can wear as a primer/base or alone as a bronzer gel. It gives you a hint of a sunkiss glow and not too dark, I am pretty fair and its perfect on my skin.
Trying this product in the winter to keep my look fresh and bring, it works! I work it on entire face with bare skin and it sits really well and doesn't feel heavy. Gives you that perfect glow.

Been a fan of Saie from the beginning but hadn't gotten a chance to try this product because I just didn't think it was necessary but boy was I wrong! I definitely have dryer skin and this is the perfect glowy moisturizing primer to whatever coverage I'm using that day. It works especially well with Saie's Slip Tint (another must have from Saie!). I love it because it gives you a natural moisturized glow and not a fake glittery one like some other brands I've tried. Also love the eco friendly packaging!

this is my new, everyday, cannot live without product. i'm pretty pale, and find this isn't too dark for me at all...it gives a light boost of healthy, glowy color and a little bit of hydration. everyone on my zoom calls compliments my skin!
reviews.review_title: don't know what i did before this product

reviews.review_text:
I FREAKING LOVE THIS STUFF. I bought the bronze version, and Saie gifted me the starglow as well. I like to mix them together, mix them with my tinted moisturizer, etc.

It's the perfect dewy finish without being sparkly and overdone. no weird smell.

This product is so good! I have both the Starglow and Sunglow. I love to mix this with my moisturizer to add a little glow to my base layer. It's not sparkly or overly shiny at all and helps you radiate - especially via zoom calls! Such a staple!
I use this under my make up and most of the time, I use this alone.  Gives a great sun kissed glow and illuminates my skin!
This is my favorite base to use under my make up. It adds a fresh glow to my skin and I love that it is clean.
reviews.review_title: Great to use as a base!

reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this super gel highlighter. It's goes on smooth and gives you that extra glow tint needed especially during the winter months. Also love that it is made out of clean ingredients.

I am quite a minimalist with my makeup, and I wasn’t all that jazzed to try this product. I am SO glad I did! This makes my skin come alive. I got Starglow and it illuminated my skin and gave it a beautiful glow. This will definitely be coming with me to Belize in April to give me that perfect sun kissed glow. Great product!
Glowy Super Gel in Starglow gives me gorgeous, lit from within skin! I love to mix it into my Slip Tint for an all over illumination. It makes my skin look beautiful!!
reviews.review_title: The Best Product I Never Knew I Needed!

reviews.review_text: Love this stuff. It is a very subtle glow, so I wouldn't recommend it if you're looking for a more dramatic glow/highlight, but it gives a great little boost of radiance to my skin if it's feeling a little dull or dry. I can put it on over my foundation and it doesn't smear it or anything. If you use powder I wouldn't put it on top of that all over, but you could dab it on as a subtle highlight. Great for winter when I'm feeling dull, or in the summer for that extra glow. I'm going to try the other color in the summer as well.

I love this super lightweight cover! I use it instead of make-up. It smooths out my skin tone and gives my face a pearly sheen. It gently reflects the light and makes me look very nice in zoom meetings.

I like an overall glowy look so I use a small amount all over my face. I definitely notice that my skin looks more radiant, even when I wear it on top of my usual moisturizer that already gives my skin a bit of a glow. Love that it’s so light, don’t feel it at all, and LOVE that it’s clean!

Listen, Glowy Super Gel is the ultimate multitasker. I use it alone, under foundation, over foundation, mixed with foundation. However you decide to use it, you get this really beautiful and healthy-looking, lit-from-within glow.

This gel highlighter is the perfect highlighter to add on your high points! Its highlight is not too subtle but also not overpowering. I also like to add a pump to my slip cover tinted moisturizer to get a sheer finish -- the combination of the skin tint and this gel highlighter gives a beautiful bright glow to your skin. I love the pump and frosted glass packaging  ♡
Warm, glowing skin in a bottle! I love this for an easy no makeup makeup days. It’s like, hydrating and gives beautiful healthy glow to the skin. I love the product. It’s my go to.

Love love love this product! It’s my go to everyday no makeup makeup product. It provides a beautiful glow & a boost of hydration. I love it! It’s a must have. I do have sensitive,acne prone skin & this doesn’t irritate or trouble my skin. It does have a strong fragrance on initial application (doesn’t bother me) , but fades away.

Okay. So you know those girls on Instagram with the perfect tan that look like they've just been dipped in butter? Well, here is a product that'll make you feel and look exactly like that. I don't know how it does it, but it'll make your skin look like it just got back from a staycation in Miami. I swear. Perfect for that "I just flew back from the St. Barths" kind of glow. Yes, for real.
I can't stop talking about how perfect Glowy Super Gel is. It makes your skin look like you just stepped out of the shower dewy. It's the perfect product
reviews.review_title: Could there be anything more perfect? No

reviews.review_text: What amazing glow and clean application. Perfect little kiss of sheen for your face. Little to no fragrance too!
This product makes my skin look hydrated and dewy in the most natural way. I love wearing this on my no makeup days and under my Saie face makeup
Glows super gel looks great, feels soft and does double duty. I use it as a highlighter and primer. Either way, it leaves a soft, bright finish. Love it!

I have oily skin, so highlighters are usually tough for me to commit to (even though I always want to love them!). This one is the perfect light feel, and the Sunglow color makes me look sun kissed which I love! I'm fair, so can always use the extra color. I put it on my cheek bones and the bridge of my nose and feel instantly more glowy. LOVE!
This dreamy gel somehow makes me look like I've gotten sleep, sun, and eaten my greens.  Love it!

Amazing product! Feels so silky and smooth when applying and adds just the right amount of glow. The glass bottle makes it feel super luxurious but not at luxury prices. I'm loving Saie products and how clean they are!
i really like this product it feels so nice and light. it says you can use it before or after foundation personally i think i get more of the glowy look if i do it after.

I’ve never had a liquid highlighter, and now I question why I hadn’t. This glides on effortlessly and provides a nice shimmer all day long! I have this in the star glow, and even with a darker skin tone this just adds a beautiful shimmer.
I love this product.  I use it alone in in the summer months for something light and dewy, and as a primer under my concealer in the dry winter months.
this highlighter gave my face a more youthful radiant look!
This is the perfect little something extra. Perfect to layer over slip tint for a little glow. Lightweight and hydrating. I just ordered the bronze color.
The perfect sun tan glow with this product. I love the radiance this gives my skin.
Immediately became my must-have product! It provides the most beautiful sheen and leaves me feeling the most glowy. And it's chic and clean! In love!

Ugh love this glass packaging. This makeup/skincare item looks so good with my other products. It applies smoothly.  Doesn’t look like I’m sparkling. Just dewy and fresh which is exactly what I was looking for. Clean and high quality ingredients. That little extra step that makes my makeup look THAT much better. Sometimes I will just wear without makeup too. Try it out!
I have pale skin and was worried this would be too be too dark for my skin but it isn’t at all. I blend it with the slip cover and it gives me a sun kissed look
This is so nice under slip cover or alone to add a little shine. Packaging is heavenly and feels and looks much more expensive than it is!

I’m a huge fan of the Starglow but this Sunglow is a game changer for that summer time glow! I mix it with my face oil and apply it all over or mix it with my Slip Tint for the extra hydration and glow with SPF. Dewy & fresh without feeling heavy or sticky.
Perfect way to add a little “color” when going without makeup or mixed with tinted moisturizer. Love this added glow!

I have 2 backups that’s how obsessed I am with this product! I love a dewy fresh glow and that doesn’t feel heavy or sticky. It gives my skin that lit from within glow people always talk about. Use it on the high points of your face or I just mix it in with my face oil each morning.

I am sure many people will say they are obsessed with this stuff. And i am one of them! it has been a quarantine lifesaver. I HATE doing my makeup these days and I throw this on over my sunscreen and its moisturizing and really natural looking. it just makes your skin look more alive. look forward to playing with it with actual full makeup someday!
I have used this to mix with Slip Tint (Saie's tinted moisturizer), as a bronzer and also as eye shadow. The formula goes on so smoothly and I love that it is multipurpose!

I have oily skin and find that this does not make me oily (yay)! On its own, I don't love it. I really prefer it mixed with slip tint! For my skin, it is the way to go. Not a must-have for me personally but I think it is a great product!

My favorite glowy base product! This has been game changing and feels soo good. This leaves a beautiful glow and doesn’t irritate my skin at all. This is perfect under makeup or alone! Has no scent or sticky feel

the best no-makeup makeup product ever! subtle glow, can be worn alone or on top of a foundation/tinted moisturizer for some luminescence. i have a relatively deep and warm south asian skin tone, and this color is perfect on me - not too light and blends gorgeously into my skin!
LOVE! It’s the perfect highlighter if you’re looking for a subtle dewy look paired with a skin tint! Not greasy and very lightweight
My FAVORITE everyday product. Gives you the best healthy, natural looking glow. Highly recommend!
I love the texture and the glow this primer gives. It blends so easily in case you want to add concealer or foundation. This is a product I didn't know I needed!! Highly recommend!!

I bought both of these colors and they’re amazing for day to day. They add an incredible soft glow to your skin and make it look flawless. These are both everyday staple necessities for me - one for summer and one for year round. You won’t be disappointed.

Literally tried as my favorite primer next to Charlotte Tilbury's Flawless Filter. Except this is clean and also is better for lighter makeup days. It's perfect over my sunscreen and just makes me look healthy and blurs out imperfections. Seriously love it. I have it in both shades and they both give such a gorgeous youthful finish.

I love this alone when I just want to look glowy, under my foundation it adds the perfect amount of glow with no highlighter needed. I also love that my daughter can use this and I don't have to worry about any harsh chemicals. It definitely helps me obtain the glow I want in the dead of winter.

If I could pick my top favorite product of all time this Saie Glowy Gel would be it. It is versatile and gives this fresh dewy look that receives so many compliments. It pairs well with tinted moisturizer or can be worn alone. I have both colors! This product gets bonus points for being clean and recycleable. Highly recommend!
reviews.review_title: Favorite clean product of all time!

reviews.review_text: I love this highlighter! It’s dewy, and glowy, and bonus points for being a clean formula. My favorite way to use this though is by mixing with Saie’s Slip Tint (tinted moisturizer). It adds such a nice glow that I don’t have to put any extra highlighter on. It also doesn’t look “unnatural” in that it has a bit of that glow-from-within look, and makes it great for everyday wear. It applies so smoothly and even though it’s a liquid, it feels creamy upon application. It’s also not glittery or shimmery, but more of a sheen. I want to try in the other color next!

I LOVE Glowy Super Gel. It's hydrating, creates a beautiful glow without being glittery and the formula is perfect for my sensitive skin. I love wearing this on it's own, or mixing with Saie Slip Tint. By far the best dewy base product ever!
(Extra points for being a clean formula!)
Give the most subtle glow/dewy look to my cheeks!!!
This is just the right combination of being glowy and good for you (it's full of squalene)!

WOW! Honestly I haven't been wearing much makeup the past year with all the work from home but wanted something simple, lightweight, and clean that could give my face a little glow even while on camera and this is IT! Every single person has asked me what my skincare regimen is. It makes my face look so healthy and literally glow in the most natural way. I am obsessed.

Love this product! If you're into the no make-up make-up look, I highly recommend it. It feels so nice & light on the skin like nothing's there but it makes all the difference. I've tried multiple dewy highlighter products and most of them leave me feeling sticky & shimmery, this product is smooth & lightweight and leaves your skin looking freshly sun kissed and glowy. Also looks great with or without foundation!

This is the perfect pinpoint highlighter or base for makeup, it isn't glittery at all. It gives the most gorgeous glow to the face without making my skin look too oily. The only liquid glow product you'll ever need!

I use this product as a primer especially during the winter months when my skin is feeling dull. I apply it under my tinted moisturizer for a natural radiance. It doesn't make my skin look oily or super shiny. Also, this product is amazing on its own as just an over all glow

Glowy Super Gel is the product you didn't know you needed until you actually try it.  It's basically a magic product that not only elevates your finished product but also your mood. The Starglow is perfect for year round use and I'd recommend adding Sunglow once Summer hits!

Love adding this super lightweight sheen to my daily makeup routine. Being in my early 40's it adds just the right amount of glow and reduces the look of fine lines around the eyes. A little goes a long way and its so smooth and well blended. No glittery pigments, its the perfect dewy effect.

questions.question: Are these like bronzing drops ?

I use sunscreen spf cream and then elf putty primer after. I usually then wear concealer after but I assume I would put this on before that. Can I use this product after the putty primer or should I put this before the primer with the sunscreen?

answers.answer: I use this as a primer under tinted spf cream. I don't feel the need for another primer.

questions.question: Can I mix this product with my moisturizer and just put concealer under my eyes? That would be all that I would use. Would that look weird, or is that not what it is used for?

answers.answer: Hi! I actually do that as my daily makeup routine! It looks great. This could sort of be an alternative for the drunk elephant bronzing drops!

questions.question:
How long does it last
Like the whole bottle
which size is worth it? mini or full size?

answers.answer: I believe the mini is totally worth it at a more affordable price point and travel option!

questions.question: This or the Charolette Tilbury flawless filter

answers.answer: Definitely this. This is an awesome purchase I have bought 2 of these. They are literally amazing! If you want more of a lightweight foundation kind of look this one is a great option!

questions.question: Is this glittery or just glowy and bronzy?

answers.answer: Glowy and bronze

questions.question: Is this safe for a 12 year old to use?

answers.answer: yes great for beginners
No
yea and the lighter shade is acne safe ￼￼

questions.question: Does this product separate your foundation?

answers.answer: no

questions.question: how dose this compare to the drunk elephant drops

answers.answer: I have the Saie glowy super gel and i personally think that Saie is better the drunk elephant drops i feel are good but have a weirder consistency or texture.
The same!! But a little more patchy, u really have to rub it in

questions.question: I need bronzing drops for summer for my pale skin. I need something with a healthy glow. I have tried the drunk elephant ones and hated them. Would these be better or would the glow recipe one be be better

answers.answer: They both are pretty similar. They both last a long time, however I feel like the DE bronzing drops are slightly more harsh and pigmented. Saie glowy gel is lighter but gives you a perfect tanned glow. Saie is also more budget friendly.

questions.question: Is this product safe for oily and sensitive skin

answers.answer: I would say I love it

questions.question: is this product good for a primer?

answers.answer: This product is awesome for a tanning natural glow! Personally I don’t think this would work as a great primer. It isn’t very tacky. However, when mixed with a primer it’s great! Stays perfect under my makeup and creates a nice glow.

questions.question: would this cover up my redness? I know it has no coverage but would the bronziness cover it up?

answers.answer: I got this a week ago and I have been using it everyday under my foundation. I don’t see any coverage but makes my skin glow like crazy 😁

questions.question: Can a 12 year old use this? My daughter has been asking for this for a long time

answers.answer: Yes! I think this is an amazing product to buy for someone starting out with makeup 😁
Yes, it’s like bronzing drops. The ingredients are really healthy.
I would say yes! it's pretty much just a glowy serum. No glitter, tint, or harsh skincare, just a nice glow! I think it would be a good way to introduce her to makeup.

questions.question: Does the glowy look last all day or will it fade down?

answers.answer: It fades a little bit but not too much. If you put a little setting spray it will last.

questions.question: Is it glittery or just sheer glow?

answers.answer: Sheer glow but you should get it it’s amazing
it is mainly just a sheer glow, but there is a small amount of glitter to it

questions.question: Is this acne safe?

answers.answer: Yes! Ofc I have acne prone skin but this product was prefect for it.

questions.question: Can I mix this with foundation?

answers.answer: I def. Would depending on where we are out or who around.: its helps with the foundation.. healthy dew positive energy
Yes. I would def do this if you want your foundation to look dewy and glowy.￼

questions.question: I have brown skin and I was wondering would the shade Sunglow would make my face darker/tanner than it is already?

answers.answer: Yes, it definitely does a good job of tanning/tinting,

questions.question: Is this save for kids? I'm twelve and would like a bronzed look. Are there other recommendations better for my skin?

answers.answer: This is actually good for young skin.

I don’t think I would recommend this to you since it has vitamin c in it. I would really recommend the L'Oreal Paris Lumi Glotion in the shade 904 since you want that bronzed look and its pretty affordable!
Yes it’s safe !

questions.question: can this be used as primer?

answers.answer: Yep! I’ve used this as a primer multiple times BUT I think this product with the elf power grip primer is soooooo good 😊
Yes! I usually use it before my makeup however it  not hold your makeup but will give you a nice base before with a glowy look! 💗💗💗
absolutely! i love it for a slightly bouncy and firming effect and a gorgeous glow.

questions.question: Does this dry down or stay wet to the touch?

answers.answer: it drys down

questions.question: Can I put this after my primer and before my foundation? Or is this best mixed with sunscreen that I apply before the primer?

answers.answer: After primer and before foundation is the best I found! I would not mix it with sunscreen since it might dilute the sunscreen but I mix it with foundation and it looks so pretty it also changes the finish to be more natural dewy and light weight.

questions.question: Is this a type of bronze drops? If so can I use them in my skincare routine or is it just makeup? Because I have pretty sensitive skin! 😅🙈

answers.answer: Yes this is like a bronzing drops! A little goes a long way! I have sensitive acne prone skin and this works great for me, I highly recommend! Its used after spf or moisturizer as a primer or a base! Hopefully this helped!!

questions.question: Is it good for 10 year olds

answers.answer: this is safe for ten year olds.starglow only glows the skin but sunflow also tints it hope this helps.
I wouldn't recommend it for 10 year olds, but there are some good tinted moisturizers that you can use that are better!

questions.question: What is the difference between this and the Saie Glowy Super Gel Lightweight Dewy multipurpose ILLUMINATOR? They used some of the same pictures too...

answers.answer: I was wondering the same thing! On Saie’s website it doesn’t have the “highlighter” or “illuminator” listed as products and just has the “glowy super gel” so I’m going to guess they are the same product!

questions.question: What is this used for?

answers.answer:
This a multi-use product. The suggested usages are: 
- As a radiant prep step under your favorite foundation 
- Stacked on top of any look as a spot highlighter for instant glass-skin 
- Mixed into cream makeup or skincare formula to boost glow 
- Worn alone on the face or body (like your chest, collarbones, shoulders, and legs) for an all-over-glow
What this basically does is give your skin a glow

questions.question: Do you use this before or after primer???

answers.answer:
Here is the suggested usage:
-Use one to two pumps and apply after any serum, oil, or moisturizer.
Glow Your Way:
-Mix a few drops into foundation or with tinted moisturizer.
-Use it alone for an easy no-makeup moment.
-Use it as a primer under foundation or tinted SPF.
-Water-based Glowy Super Gel plays well with most foundations as long as they aren’t too oily. If you’re not sure, test it out on your hand.
-Use it for an all-over glow on your face or anywhere you’re bare like your chest, collarbones, shoulders, and legs.

questions.question: Is this product okay for kids? 10-11

answers.answer: I’m 13 and i really love this product, but i don’t think it’s suitable for 10-11 year olds just because of its ingredients.

I'd definitely be careful ! This product contains Ascorbyl Tetraisopalmitate & Lactic Acid , which are great ingredients but for young skin may be too harsh.  Ascorbyl Tetraisopalmitate is an awesome Vitamin C derivative , but for 10-11 yr old skin that doesn't require the benefits of vitamin C (increasing collagen production, reducing dark spots, killing free radicals, antioxidizing, etc) it may do more harm than good. Lactic Acid is a form of AHA (chemical exfoliation) known to help improve fine lines and increase new cell turnover. At the ages of 10-11, they really don't need to improve fine lines or increase cell turnover! Their skin is in the prime of doing that naturally and this may interfere! These are in low concentrations in the product & the product has many other great ingredients for young skin, but please be aware!

questions.question: Is this skincare or something that needs to be washed off?

answers.answer:
This is a Liquid Highlighter with a Dewy finish. 

It is a Makeup product that has some skincare ingredients in it. 
(other Brands also add skincare ingredients into some of their Makeup products too)

A Highlighter is used to highlight/accentuate the high points of the face.
(opposite of Contour)

This specific Highlighter can be used alone on bare skin, all over your skin, high points of face, under makeup, on top of makeup, mixed in with moisturizer, mixed in with foundation, or as a primer before makeup application. 
- It is a Multi-Use Highlighter 

You would wash this product off whenever you are ready to take off all of your makeup.
- No special instructions to remove this product, it will easily wash off
- Just do your usual cleansing ritual and follow with your skincare routine

On the Product Page on Sephora, there are sections that tell you exactly what the product is, how to use it and what is in it - just click "Read More"
- Every product on Sephora has this information
Hi there! You would wash the product off during your cleansing routine.

questions.question: How does SunGlow compare to the drunk elephant bronzi drops? I find DE hard to blend on its own and it looks very orange/doesn't really last. Always needs to be mixed in with another product.

D-Bronzi is a VERY concentrated Liquid Bronzer that absolutely NEEDS to be mixed with a Moisturizer!

It can not be used on its own!
- says so on the bottle too!

If you do not mix D-Bronzi with Moisturizer it will look patchy, discolored, not blend well, etc..etc..

Highlighters are used to highlight/illuminate and  Bronzers are used to add a bronze/tan color and warmth...

Sun Glow and D-Bronzi are two completely different products...so you can't really compare them to each other...

questions.question: Trying to decide between this and the Hollywood Filter....  any direction or info would be appreciated from anyone who's tried both. Trying to decakeify my makeup for a natural look.

answers.answer: They are both beautiful, but if you are going for the most minimal natural effect, go with Saie. It is a lighter weight fluid texture, whereas the FF is more viscous so the texture is not quite as true-to-skin as the Saie. Also keep in mind that FF comes in skin tones, so you are adding color, and not just glow- which may or may not be what you are looking for. I'm hesitant to call it "coverage," because it isn't really that, but when I wear FF it is like wearing a skin tint with some neutralizing effect. Whereas when I wear Saie it is exclusively for the radiance- not evening out redness or anything like that. Hope this helps you decide which one you want!

I own FF in 2, it?s more of a peachy beige shade and the Saie is more gel like and champagne. I think it?s more of a watery texture too. I love them both, I would get both the minis and decide from there. Sorry to not be that much help!
